247a8(rgyud 'grel): brdzun du smra ba'i tshig dag bya// gang lagasang bar bya rnams dang // gsang bcud la 'dre brdzun badz+ra sgra// bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blang // zhing bcur gyur pa'i nong bcu dang // mtshan ldan 
247b1(rgyud 'grel): gzungs dang bkra shis rdzas// sras chos phal 'chang byin can rdzas// bsrung ba yod dang med pa'i gter// phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor// ming gis blangs la tshogs su bsngo// dam tshig bcu bdun spyad par bya// 
247b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can la// brlang tshig bcu ya saM zhes bcad de// drag shul spyod pa'i sngags dag dang // gzungs la brlang po'i sbyor tshig dang // slob bu spyod ces zhe gcod dang // 'byung po zhe spyod
247b3(rgyud 'grel): rngam pa'i sgra// snod ldan bul blang chos bshad// ngag gi dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // mi spang dam tshig bcad par bya// yang dgadug lnga log dug lnga// bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang // 'dod 
247b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod sems kyi rgyan shes nas// shin tu zhen pa'i lam du gsungs// zhing bcu drag byed zhe sdang gcod// lhas ngan 'joms pa de bzhin te// thabs la mkhas pas spyod pa yin// mngon par mtho ba'i lta ba dang / 
247b5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs dang // shin tuN+Dal ba'i mchog tu gsungs// skabs phyogs rigs mi 'byed pa// spyad pas blang dor mi byed pa// theg pa chen po'i gti mug go// rtswa spyod dmanal phag dag cing / 
247b6(rgyud 'grel): dmam 'dres sogs sang byed pas// phrag dog dam tshig bsrung ba'o// logadug sems can kun ldan pas// dug lnga dang rig dang ldan phyir// dran pa thams cad shes pa la// shes pa thams cad rdol ba yin// 
247b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul ba'i sems phyir thabs mkhas pas// thabs mkhas rang rig ye shes te// nyi ma'i dkyilan mun med ltar// rig la rang snang ma gtogs pa// nyon mongs 'khor ba rang gis mang// de shes ye shes rab 
247b8(rgyud 'grel): rigs las// spang bar bya ba dmigs mi 'gyur// dam tshig bco lnga gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor chen po'i don gnyis rdzogs// kun gyis blang ba'i dmatshig lnga// dri chen du chu mangs dang // zil pa lhag pas 
248a1(rgyud 'grel): sems rnams dang // grub pa bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir// nad lnga bsal phyir blang ba dang // gtsang rme tog sbyang phyir blang dang // thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang // rigs lnga grub pa'i yon tan 
248a2(rgyud 'grel): no// sdug bsngal las grol dngos thub thob// bcud ldan lhung lnga lam gyis mchog/ thabs kyi lus la brten shes nas// yon tan brjod las 'das par gsungs// bya ba'i dam tshig sum cu gnyis// skabs 
248a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dang du blang bar bya'o// bsgrub par bya ba rnam lnga la// rigs dang ye shes yab yum la// gcig la'ang lnga lngar shes par bya// su dang gsung thugs yon tan la// gcig la'ang lnga lngar phye bas na/ 
248a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bye brag rnams// mtshan nyid shes nas sgrub par bya// shes pa lnga las bye brag tu// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po yul dang yan lag song // nyon mongs dam rdzas sha dang ni/ 
248a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang kha dog 'gro ba dang // snyigs ma bag chags lnga lnga'o// bdun bcu la sogs 'khor ba'i chos// ye shes su rigs yab yum sogs// rang gzhan gis skur dgal// blo la nyams su lon pa ni/ 
248a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul yongs dag rnal 'byor pa'o// thun mong dam tshig mdor bsdu na// bdag gzhan don du shes par bya'o// rgyan 'gyed lus mdzes 'du lta dang // chang dang dregs spyod khengs sems dang // che dag dge slong 
248a7(rgyud 'grel): sdig spyod dang // le lo ser sna gnyid g.yengs dang // khro ga tum ye shes sngon mi gtong // bka' btsog sdig pa'i grogs sten dang // bag med spyod dang dam chos 'dor// chos mi shes dang rngon la dga'// 
248a8(rgyud 'grel): spang bya nyi shu gcig bzlog pa// bdag don mchog tu gyur pa ste// kun gyis bdag nyid bkur bar gyur// pha rol phyin drug chos spyod bcu// rnam gzhi las kyi spyod pa dang // mthun 'jug las kyi spyod pa ni// / 
248b1(rgyud 'grel): theg pa dgu dang mu stegs dgu// 'gro ba drug gi spyod pa rnams// 'dzin dang nyam nga med par spyod// don 'gyur ci yang nyams su blang // bzhi bcu bzhi la sogs pa yis// gdul bya gang yang dor mi bya// bsrung // 
248b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de dag grangs btab pa// dran dang shes bzhin gyis spyod pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs// nyams par gyur pa'i rgyu dag ni// mi chos blon po las byed dang // bdag stod gzhan smod gzung
248b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mkhas// khengs dregs gnyis phyir 'du ba ste// rdzas la chags sems dang phyogs che// 'chang dang rang mthong lta spyod skems// chos la phyogs ris ngoms skyen dang // gsang chung le lo gtsang rme che// 
248b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo skur grogs kyi nyams len dang // 'khor ba'i rigs rgyud spel 'dod cing // gcig pur mi dga' 'dul dga'// nyi shu nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// snga rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni// nyam nga ba'i nad rnams dang // 
248b5(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs gnyis la bde mi 'jug/ 'khor dang longs spyod yid 'ong 'bral// ya ga mnyes la sogs 'byung // brtsams pa'i las la 'bras med cing // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung // gal te nyams la rtag/ 
248b6(rgyud 'grel): med par// legs par snang na mi rung ste// bde ba zad med gtan du sdug/ gal te nyams la rtags byung na// sngon gyi rnam smin zad 'gyur phyir// bskang ba'i las rnams brtson byas na// ngan song sdug bsngal 
248b7(rgyud 'grel): myong mi 'gyur// nyams par gyur pa'i skyon bshad pa// byang sems dam tshig nyams gyur na// bskal par dge ba ci bsags kyang // gzhi rten med par gyur pa yis// 'khor ba'i khams gsum zag par
248b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sku'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yanga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal 'byung // dus min tshe zad par chad mang // bskal par rdo rje dmyal bar lhung // bde bas rab tu brel bar 'gyur// gsung gi dam
249a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig nyams gyur na// bgegs rnams thogs med 'ong ba dang // rkyen dang ye 'drog mang ba dang // chos la byin brlabs med 'gyur zhing // bskal pa gnyis su dmyal bar ltung // sgrub pa'i
249a2(rgyud 'grel): dam las 'das par 'gyur// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// smyo 'bod dbang po nyams dang 'tshal// myos shing skur pa'i gnas su 'gyur// gang yang sgrub la rtags med cing // lce la zhing rmo la sogs/ 
249a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// dmyal bar bskal pa gsum la gnas// rtsa ba kun nyams phal pa dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson na// rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste// dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdom pas ni// 
249a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'bum gyi char mi phod// sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las kun// rgyun du mdzad kyang phrin mi 'gyur// bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su// de ni thon par mi 'gyur te// / 
249a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'jig na'ang gzhan du 'pho// se gol gcig gis phyin par byed// de bas shin tu nan tan gyis// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// longs spyod mang du 'phel ba med// theg pa che la 'phyas 'dogs
249a6(rgyud 'grel): shing // thun mong mchog gis dngos grub rnams// shin tu ring bar gyur pa dang // gdul bya'i don rnams yal 'gyur zhing // lta spyod ya char gyur pa yis// theg pa phyi nang 'dres pa nyid// bka'i byin nyams 'grub
249a7(rgyud 'grel): par dka'// bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing // bskal par ngan song ltung bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngo skams nyid du 'gyur// rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis// dam
249a8(rgyud 'grel): tshitsheg ma nyams gzhung mthun dang // lus la nad thung mtshan ldan zhing // thun mong nyes byas dag par 'gyur// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing // theg chen zab mo'i don thob gyur// gsung gis lha mnyes 
249b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud 'phel zhing // mthu dang byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// las rnams dus su 'grub par 'gyur// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thugs kyi skyo du ba med pa dang // man ngag snod 'gyur dngos 
249b2(rgyud 'grel): grub nye// dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang // lha rnams kyis ni dbang bskur 'gyur// yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na// skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan 'gyur// bdud bzhi bcom zhing ngan song skyob// theg chen lta/ 
249b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod gzhung bsrang bas// lha rnams 'gro zhing bsams pa 'grub// don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// theg chen dam tshig la gnas na// 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig kun// bsrung ba med par
249b4(rgyud 'grel): thub pas na// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po yin// nyams na bskad pa'i thabs rnams ni// byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na// mkhas la gnas te gnas par bya// 
249b5(rgyud 'grel): sku yis dam tshig nyams gyur na// gang la nyams pa der song la// nor rdzas mnyes pa der dbul nas// gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la// phyin chad sdom pa legs par bca'// gal te grongs chad gyur pa na// 
249b6(rgyud 'grel): de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la// dam tshig gong ma bzhin du bshags// med na mnyam pa brgyal bshags// de yang rnyed par ma gyur na// de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug la// sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs nas// 
249b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su// spyan drangs gsang mtshan la sogs mchod// gong du smos pa'i yon rnams kyang // mnyam po gsum la dbul bar bya// gal te gus par mi len na// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar
249b8(rgyud 'grel): skye// de bas myur du tshangs pa bya// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du// nges par shes te skongs par 'gyur// bzlas pa sngags kyis bsab pa dang // bsgrub pa chen po gsum/ 
250a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bskang // thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na// bdag nyid bdag la gsang bar byed// mi rtog ting 'dzin rlung zhugs te// ma yengs blo la 'gris// 
250a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs kyis bskang // de ltar nyams su blangs na skongs// snga rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// dam tshig 
250a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dpes bstan pa// sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// lam dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun// dam tshig med par 'byung mi srid// sa mtha'i mkhar gyi rang bzhin pas// srung ba thub dang mthub las// legs// / 
250a4(rgyud 'grel): nyes stobs chen spyod pa'o// rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dngos grub dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung // nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// 'di yod thams cad shong bar 'gyur// rno dpal mtshon gyi rang bzhin// / 
250a5(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'khor ba'i 'dra ba gcod pa la// pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// rlabs chen dus dus 'byung bar byed// me dpung lta bu'i rang 
250a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pas// gangs mtsho thams cad tshig par 'gyur// de bzhin rtsi sman rang bzhin pas// 'khor ba'i gcong snying ma lus 'byin// rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// phyogs 'ga' brten yang rims kyis 'tsho// 
250a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho nor len ded dpon dang // thog ma nas mthar 'dis phyin pas// 'di la shin du nan tan bya'o// dam tshig dam chog ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin// ji snyed snang 
250a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos rnams kun// rang rig rkyen bral nyid snang bas// cir snang cingar srid rang rig nyid// 'gro ldog spyi tshugs gang song yang // snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yi// rang bzhin 
250b1(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub dam tshig la// rigs pas phyin ci ma log na// mngon snang gdags pa'i chos med pas// lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad// de dag blo la 'dris pa yis// spyod lam kun yang ma nyams par// 
250b2(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig ste// sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ 'di la bsrung ba ci yang med// nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid// ma 'gags spyod pa 'dzin med pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi ldan// 
250b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bya ma lus 'dir 'dus byer// dam tshig kun gyi med zhes so// sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen las// lam 'bras snying po me ling bcu gcig gis mtshan pa// 'khor ba'i dang mchus 
250b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis sgeg pa'i blos bsdus pa'i// dge rtsas kun kyang dam gnas 'gro kun byang chub shog/ spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa// dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa// dam tshig chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// 
250b5(rgyud 'grel): tshum khrims dang zlom pa dang dam tshag mi 'gal ba le gas dpal kyis mdzad pa zhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shI la sam+ba ra sa ma yA bi ru d+hA na ma/ bod skad du/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba/ 
250b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal tshogs kun mkhyen dam pa'i dbang phyug snying rje'i mchog gi bdud rtsis brnyan pa'i blo gros can// gzhan don yon tan dri med bden 
250b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rin chen rin thang med pa mang po 'thob pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba nyon mongs ha la ha la'i dug zos rnams la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char ba yis// mya ngan 'das pa dam pa'i don byed pa yi dpal ldan gang yin 
250b8(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis rtag tu bsrungs// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing // bde gshegs byin brlabs med pa dang // mang du thos pa dang bral zhing // zos pa zhu dus chos shes pa// mkhas pa nyid du rlom byed rnams// 
251a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang sngags dang phyag rgya sogs// sbyin la sogs dang sangs rgyas yum// lung nod ji bzhin ma rtogs pas// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom// 
251a2(rgyud 'grel): dang por bzung nas de 'og tu// rab tu byung nas dge slong ngam// dang por rab tu byung brten nas// sngags dang pha rol byin lam gnas// phyi nas de rnams rmongs sogs kyi// 'dul ba yi ni bstan bcos las// / 
251a3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la sogs sdom gnas pa// so sor thar dang lo drir gnas// der bstan pa yi bslab pa rnams// phal cher bsrung bar mi nus pas// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang // 'gal ba nyid du gnas/ 
251a4(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas// de ltar de spangs rnam par gnas// de dag mi shes bsal phyir dang // bstan pa 'khrul pa zlog pa'i phyir// rigs 'dzin gyi ni dam tshig rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang // so sor 
251a5(rgyud 'grel): thar gsungs sdom pa ni// rgyu 'bras ltos 'brel grul rnams la// mi 'gal 'brel pa gsal bar bya// sgrub pa lung bzhin bya ba ni// dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal snga nas// yang dag shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon 
251a6(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs pa brgyad rnams dang // dam tshig dbang bskur thob pa yis// shin tu man ngag dang ldan pas// dpal ldan 'dus sogs rgyud kyi don// rim pa gnyis ni rnam dbye ba// thob pa des bsam snying 
251a7(rgyud 'grel): rje yis// bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// kun las phyir mi ldog brtan bya// thabs kyi rang bzhin bya ba 'am// sgom pa yi ni lam dag ste// sbyin la sogs pa'i 
251a8(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa la// yang na sngags spyod rim pa las// rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni// bsten pa yongs su btang mi bya// mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba yi// gtsug lag gi ni bstan bcos dang // gtsug 
251b1(rgyud 'grel): lag ma yin lo dri sogs// slob dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// so sor thar sogs sdom pa ni// dge slong blo dang ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag brten// 
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub dang // dpal ldan 'chi bdag las rgyal ba'i// bstan pa yang ni bsrung phyir dang // de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gnas pa'i// mi dang lha sogs 'jig rten rnams// sems sun 'byin/ 
251b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhom phyir ro// sdom pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni// dpal ldan rgyal bas gang gsungs pa// phan tshun 'gal ba dag tu ni// gang yang nam du'ang gnas ma yin// chos 'dul las ni bcom ldan gyis// so sor 
251b4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i sdom pa ni// rnam pa brgyad gsungs 'di lta ste// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge slong dge tshul dge tshul ma// de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas pa'o// de rnams bslab pa'ang/ 
251b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dbye ba// dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang chen po// snying rje ldan pas gsungs pa ni// dge bsnyen pho mo dag gi sdom// rnam pa lnga ru rab bstan te// 'di ltar srog gcong spong ba nas// myos 'gyur chang mi 'thung 
251b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar// dge tshul pho mo'i sdom dag ni// mgon pos rnam pa bcur gsungs te// srog gcod pa la sogs pa nas// ji srid gser dngul la sogs pa// len pa spong ba'i bar du'o// de bzhin gzhan ni bar 
251b7(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i// 'dus las bcu gnyis nyid yin te// chos dang rjes su mthun pa rnams// thar pa'i lam ni dag phyir gsungs// thub pa thugs rje chen po yis// spang bya thams cad spangs pa ni// dge slong dge slong ma 
251b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi// sdom pa yin par gsungs pa yin// thub pa thugs rje chen po yis// glu dang gang sogs phreng ba sogs// gcig byas phyed dang dus min zas// bar gyi spang bya brgyad spangs pa// bsnyen gnas kyi ni 
252a1(rgyud 'grel): sdom par gsungs// sbyin la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos// bya ba thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// bstan pa rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
252a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi// sdom pa nyid du gsungs pa yin// phyag rgya sngags sogs rnal 'byor gyi// rim pa gnyis la brten pa las// rdo rje ye shes lus ngag gi/ lha'i rnam par rab bsgoms pa// thabs dang ldan par sgrub pa ni// byang chub 
252a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i bslab 'grub pas// so sor thar sdom gyis de 'grub// gsang sngags sbyin sogs dbye ba las// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis// dge slong la sogs dbye bya ste// dge slong sogs sdom dbye ba 
252a4(rgyud 'grel): med/ dge slong nyid sdom gcig yin te// de bzhin len dang sgrub pa'ang gcig/ rab byung sdom pa btang nas ni// sngags kyi sdom dang sbyin sogs kyi// sdom pa yang ni gzung mi bya// gsang sngags kyi ni sdom pa dang // 
252a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs sdom pas bsdams pa dang // rnyed dang bkur sti'i rgyu yis sam// gnas kyi 'tsho ba 'grub don du// rab byung sdom pa len 'dod na// dge slong min pas sdom mi bya// gsang sngags sbyin sogs ldan pa ni/ 
252a6(rgyud 'grel): rab byung sdom pa bsgrub pa'o// 'phags pa mgon po byams pa yis// 'di ltar mkhyen te gsungs pa ni// rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dag ni// yon tan chad med rnams dang ldan// de ltar sdom brtson khyim pa yi// byang chub/ 
252a7(rgyud 'grel): sems las khyad par 'phags// gsang sogs lam dang sbyin sogs kyi// lam nyid dag ni dge slong gis// dge slong mkhas las blang bya yi// gzhan nyid las ni ma yin no// sngags dang sbyin so// sa la/ 
252a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rnam gsum// dang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang // dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims ste// des bsgrub 'di 'grub nges pa yin// / 
252b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bas 'dul ba'i sde snod las// dge slong sdom gang gsungs de ni// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yi/ tshul khrims sdom pa'i cha ru 'gyur// dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dang // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// dbugs dbyung dgal 
252b2(rgyud 'grel): brten nas ni/ rdo rje'i lam ni gnyis su gnas// de la bde gshegs dbugs dbyung ba// dge slong rnams la zhi sems kyis// ma lus spros pa dang bral ba// gsungs pa dbang spyod sogs rim bya// phyi rol shes rab 
252b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas ni// rtag tu rang snang shes rab ldan// de la 'dul las gsungs pa yi// sdom pa yin byang chub sgrub// rdo rje'i bdag nyid thob pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i rol pa ni// dge slong bdag nyid gyur pa yi// 
252b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs// gos dkar sogs dang snyoms 'jug pa// do shal dpung rgyan gdu bu yis// rnam par brgyan cing gos dag ni// shin tu bzang po snabs pa ru// dpal ldan 'dus sog/ 
252b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung bas// sems can kun gyi don 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba// rtag tu khyim pa sbyang pa'i phyir// dbang bskur la sogs rim pa ni// spros dang bcas pa de la gsungs// sems sogs/ 
252b6(rgyud 'grel): 'os su gyur pa la// phyi rol rig ma'i dbang bskur bya// spros pa med pas rab byung la// dge slong rnams kyis de sbyin te// 'dul la sogs pa'i sdom pa ni// thams cad ldan pa'i slob ma la// rtag tu rang snang shes/ 
252b7(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi// bsgom pa gsal bar bya phyir ro// sbyin sogs spyod dang sngags sogs spyod// rnal 'byor gnas pa'i bdag nyid dag/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas chos// rang dang gzhan la rab bsgrub par/ 
252b8(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'jug pa'i dge slong gi/ dngos gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bso du nyan thos nyid gnas pa'i// zhi ba 'dod pa'i dge slong gis// 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa yang // phran mo tsam yang 
253a1(rgyud 'grel): gtad mi bya// khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang // gang tshe tshangs spyod nyid bsrung na// rab byung byang chub sems dpa' yis// rang gi tshul khrims ji ltar dor// dpal ldan mgon po byams// 
253a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang // 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid du// byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs so// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yi// sbyin sogs bya ba'i lam gyis sam// yang na sngag 
253a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sdom pa yis// gnas te de nyid sgrub byed pas// 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa ni// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung// dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang po ni// thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin des// theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la/ theg pa// 
253a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// zhes bya bar ni gsungs pa yin// sdom pa rnams ni sdom pa yin// gong nas gong du rjes 'jug ste// 'di ltar dge bsnyen sdom pa ni// dge tshul gyi ni rjes su 'jug/ gang de 
253a5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong rjes su 'jug/ gang dag nyan thos dge slong gi/ sdom gsungs byang chub sems dpa' yi// rjes su 'jug ste kun ldan pas// dge slong shin tu khyad par 'phags// byab thabs kyi sbyong ba ni// 
253a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ste// sngags pas sbyin la sogs pa ste// thams cad du ni 'jug par bya// gal te sdom pa 'gal gyur na// dge slong gi sdom pa rnams// phul bar gyur na dge tshul dang // dge 
253a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen yang ni mi gnas 'gyur// sems can doni la ltos pa yis// so sor thar gsungs sdom gtong zhes// gal te de ltar brjod byed na// de dag nges par rmongs pa yin// blo ldan khyad par 'phags pa yi// dge slong 
253a8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' ni// thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du// rmi lam du yang 'gal mi bsam// sbyin la sogs pa bya ba 'am// yang na de nyid bsgom bya yin// dge slong sems can bsgrub pa'am// byang chub 
253b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' snying rje che// gzhan don byed par 'dod rnams kyis// 'dul la sogs pa'i dge slong gi/ bya ba tshul khrims khyad 'phags byir// tshul khrims lhag par brtan par bya// 'dul ba las brjod tshul khrims ni/ 
253b2(rgyud 'grel): dge slong nyid du bsgrub bya'i phyir// ji srid 'tsho bar brten bya ba// sems can don yin btang mi bya// sngags sogs bsgom la gnas pa dang // sbyin la sogs la gnas pa yi// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' 
253b3(rgyud 'grel): yas// so song ze gsungs bslab pa ni// nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// btang na dmyal sogs 'gro bar 'gyur// de ltar ma gyur rnam nges na// yang dag byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir// dge slong sdom pa yang 
253b4(rgyud 'grel): dgapa// so song thang la gnas par bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras la gus pas lung dang rig pa yis// shin na drim med cing mi 'gal rlom rnams byas pa las// bdag gis zla 'od sa bu'i dag ba bsags pa 
253b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin des// 'jig rten ma lus dpal ldan rtul ba'i dbang po myur grub shog/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam chog mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba// slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad 
253b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzugs so// tsho'i mkhan po sprin thA thAd de nyid dang / rkuchen gyi po co ba dge slong blazlas snying po dang // dge slong bzhi ba shes gnyen gyis bstud cing thus te gtan la phab pa/ 
253b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyag gad du/ serbas ma la sa rba ha nAm/ bad ga nga/ dmachog thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de la rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHtrA~M 
253b8(rgyud 'grel): ma byed gsum padag nyid// dpa ma ldan par chen rdordzal// bdud degs grags theg pa'i gzung // rlud pas gsungs pa bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sto zhugs pas 'dzi 
254a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yang chen po 'di 'og ma rnams las khyad par du 'phags te// ji ltar zhe na 'di skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas thams cad chos kyi skur rtogs pas kun tu 
254a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i rgyas thebs pa dang 'jig rten gyi lha chen po dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pas bkur gnas byed pas byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pas thugs la dgongs 
254a3(rgyud 'grel): shing byin gyis brlabs pas dngos grub myur ba dang / bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang spyod yul gcig pas 'khor ba dang ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing dbugs byin pa dang / rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing sku 
254a4(rgyud 'grel): dang gsung dang thugs mi phyed pas bar du gcod pa gang yang med pa dang / phyi nang thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par yid ches pas dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / gal te nyams na yang rang bzhin gyis 
254a5(rgyud 'grel): songs par 'gyur ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so// yang slob dpon chen po in+d+ra bo d+ha'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i khyad par dang snod kyi byud par dang cho ga'i khyad par dang las kyi khyad par dang dam tshig gi khyad par dang lta ba'i khyang 
254a6(rgyud 'grel): par dang spyod pa'i khyad par to bdun gyis 'phags so zhes gsungs so// slob dpo ni chen po ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas sngags kyi theg pa ni rnam pa gsum gyis thun mong ma yin te/ 'di ltar sgrub pa po dang lam 
254a7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'bras bu gsum mo zhes gsungs so// slob dpon tri bid tra ma'i zhal snga nas ni/ don gcig na yang marmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas// sngags kyi theg pa 
254a8(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// slob dpon DoM bi he ru ka'i zhal nas kyang 'dir ni snod kyi khyad par dang snod du byed pa'i chos dang gzhung dang lam gyi khyad par dang 'bras bu dag gi khyad par gyis sngags kyi theg pa/ 
254b1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'phags zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal nas kyang gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa chen po'i yang chen po yin te/ 'di ltar rten gyi gang zag gi khyad par dang / 'jug pa lam gyi khyad 
254b2(rgyud 'grel): par dang / mthar thug pa 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so// slob dpon rat+na A kar shAn+ti pa'i zhal snga nas 'dir/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa

254b5(rgyud 'grel): dang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi lo tog skye ba'i sa gzhir gyur pa yin pas de bri bar bya'o// dam tshig kyang gang zhe na/ rten dang rgyu dang rtsa ba dang ngo bo dang nges pa'i tshig dang dbye ba dang ming gi rnam grangs dang rkang grangs dang brda dang / 
254b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang dgra dang nyams pa'i tshad dang skongs pa dang ma nyams pa'i rtags dang bsngo ba grang bya ba dang bskang ba dang bsdus pa'i dam tshig dang nyams pa'i nyes dmigs dang ma nyams pa'i phan yon dang 'bras bu rnams so// 
254b7(rgyud 'grel): des na rten ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can skyabs su 'gro ba gnyis sngon du song ba bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob pa'o// de la rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so// rtsa ba/ 
254b8(rgyud 'grel): ni snying rje'o// ngo bo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang / snying rje dang shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa shes pa'i rgyun no// nges tshig ni rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ thob cing mi 'da'
255a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir ro// de la dbye ba ni rtsa ba dang sbom po yan lag gi sgo nas dbye ba dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyod pa dang lta ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyi dang khyad par dang lhag pa'i sgo nas

255a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de la ming gi rnam grangs ni dam tshig dang sdom pa dang brtul zhugs dang spyod yul dang dka' sprad dang spyod pa dang shI la la sogs pa'o// de la rkang grangs ni thun mong gi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtsa 
255a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ltung ba bcu gnyis dang kr-i ya'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gsum dang / spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba

255a6(rgyud 'grel): su blta bar bya'o// de la dam tshig gi brda ni ji skad du// mi bshig pa ni seng+ge ste// gcan zan rgyal po yin pas so// za ma tog ni rgyal mo mdzod// dug sbyor ba ni der mi rigs// ra ta na myu gu lkug phran dag 
255a7(rgyud 'grel): phrabs te 'byung rgyun gcad mi bya// gangs kyi zhu chu phal pa yang // mkhas pas btung bar mi bya'o// pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha ma dbye// zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya// ma brtags bug rdol can snod du// bdud rtsi sman blugs//

257b8(rgyud 'grel): rims 'ongs de nyid man dag ni// de yis ji ltar 'grub mnyam dgongs zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dmatshig nyams na dper na shing chen po rtsab tshig pa'am skams pa'am 'bag pa dang 'dri ste/ 
258a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang de las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sbom po'i nyes pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shing chen sdong po dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad mi 'byung // 
258a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gi ltung ba ni shing gi yal ga dang 'dra bar phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do// gzhan yang 'di la g.yel ba dang mchod pa dang gtor ma chags na byin brlabs chung ba dang rnal 'byor sngo skams so// 
258a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i thugs ma zin zhing bka' bcag na bgegs ldang ngo // spyod pa rtsing ba dang bag med na 'byor pa brlag par 'gyur ro// gal te dam tshig ma bsrungs kyang bkra shis pa 'dra na yang 'bral du tshe la gnod pa med kyang 
258a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtags yin te/ dper na rgyal po'i bka' chad byung na de la zan dang chang mang po brud nas gzi bar byas na phyis gsod do// dam tshig kha cig legs par bsrungs pa las sdug 
258a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal dang bar chad mang ba ltar 'dug kyang de tshe rabs snga ma'i las kyi lhag ma lus pa yin pas des ni myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa na tshe 'dir yang

258a7(rgyud 'grel): dang tshig ma nyams pa'i phan yon ni tshe ring ba dang longs spyod che ba dang ci bsam pa 'grub pa dang / mthu dang byin brlabs che ba dang bkra shis par 'gyur ro// bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang mchod pa la brtson pas rnal 
258a8(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa sdom skams par longs spyod che ba dang bla ma'i bka' ma bcag cing gus pas bar chad med pa dang rdo rje spun la brtse gdung byas pas mi ma yin rnams kyis bkur sti byed do// g.yo sgyu med pas mi dang mi ma yin 
258b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'chol bar ma spyad pas 'byor pa brtan pa dang bas shis so// 'chi ba'i dus su yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bsu nas rigs 'dzin gyi gnas su khrid do// 
258b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang nas skye ba 'od dang phyi ma dang skye ba bdun dang skye ba bcu drug tshun chad kyis 'grub pa la the tshom med do// de la dam tshig thams cad bsnyun gnyis te/ snying rje rus pa'i gting nas skye ba dang shes rab tshig tsam ma 
258b3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa gting nas go ba'o// 'di gnyis rgyud la brtan na dang po nyid nas nyes pa mi 'byung la gal te byung na yang myur du bsongs par 'gyur ro// gzhan pa mad ma tshig thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems 
258b4(rgyud 'grel): su 'dus te de yang rnam pa gzhi'o// byang chub kyi sems dang bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems dang kun tu bzang po'i sems dang rdo rje byang chub kyi sems so// de la so so zad pa'i sdom pa ni las dge 
258b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig gtsor sngon no// mdo sde sdom pa ni snying rje gtsang ston no// gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni sgra gsung thugs kyi mi byed pa gcod ston no// de del sa sor thad pa'i sdom pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa 
258b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan po las skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po las skye'o// gsang sngags kyi sgom pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems las skye'o// de la sa sathar pa'i sdom pa ni spong ba bdun no// 
258b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni spong ba bcu'o// sngags kyi sdom pa ni spong ba gcig go/ so so thar pa'i gzhung du ni kha na ma tho ba gnyi ga brjod do// byang chub sems dpa'i gzhung du ni rang bzhin 'ba' zhig 
258b8(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// sngags kyi gzung du ni de gnyig zas dam brjod do// yangs so thar pa'i sdom pa ni rdzas kyi bdag nyid du yod par 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni brtag pa tsam du yod par 'dod de// 
259a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags su ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do// yang nyan thos kyi sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos mang du yod do// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos nyung zad gcig go/ sngags kyi 
259a2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa la ni bar chad kyi chos bshad med de// yang sdom pa dang po la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang ba'i skal ba med do// bar ma la ni pham pa byud na phyis blang ba'i skal ba yod do// za ma ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems 
259a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldanan rnams pa med de// del stom pa dang pal ni mkhan po dang skab pa ni dgos so// ba ma'i rnam pa la nA thA ma ga tsug pu'am ya namadapa'// tha ma de la na bzhin/ tha ma nas nam thung ba'i 
259a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang / ye shes lha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa'i dbang dang // rang nyid kyi sems kyi rtsal gyis thob pa'i dbang dang ngo // yang snga ma ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa 
259a5(rgyud 'grel): las ldog go// bar ma ni de'i steng du gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o// byi ma ni de'i sted du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod nyams su len pa'o// yang dang po'i sdom pa ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o// bad ma'i sdom pa ni/ 
259a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o// sngags kyi sdom pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o// yang dang po'i sdom pa ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi don na// bar ma'i sdom pa ni gzhan 'ba' zhig gi 
259a7(rgyud 'grel): don no// phyi ma'i sdom pa ni gnyi ga'i don no// yang dang po'i sdom pa ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnos so// bar ma'i sdom pa ni snying po byang chub kyis bar du'o// phyi ma'i sdom pa ni na mkha' ji srid gnas kyi bar 
259a8(rgyud 'grel): ru // sdom pa dang po'i 'bras bu ni mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis so// bar ma'i 'bras bu nis bcu 'ams bcu gcig pa'o// tha ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang bsgom sgrub dang 
259b1(rgyud 'grel): chos spyod yi dam gyi lhas ma khrel ba dang / dad pa dang bsnyen bkur bla mas mkhrel ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis mkhrel ba dang / brtse gdung phan gnod rdo rje spun pho mos mkhrel ba dang / 
259b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod dang gtor ma dang cho ga'i nus pa dang byin brlabs mtshan mo rgyu ba'i 'byung ba'i chags kyis ma khrel ba dang / rdo rje bla ma'i man ngagazab mi zlab rang gi slob mas mkhrel ba dang / lci ba zab mi zab mkhas 
259b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis pa khrel ba dang ji ltar dam bcas pa'i don rang gi sems kyis ma khrel ba dang / spyod pa bzang ngan grogs pos mkhrel ba dang / gtong phod dang / gsol gsheg dang / ro tshod dang / zhi nges dang /

259b5(rgyud 'grel): te// sems nyid lta nyid sgyu ma nyid// 'odagasal yin te mnyam nyid gzhi// dag pa gzhi yang de nyid yin// nyin dang mtshan ma gla par ni// sems kyi skad cig ri re la// de ltar mos pa yang yang b+ha/ 
259b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje shugs dang mi ldan yang // rnang ba byin gyis brlabs pa yin// de lta bu yi sngags pa ni// dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa med// b+haM ga lar skyes dge slong ni// mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis// 
259b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhung dang bla ma'i man ngag gis// dam tshig thams cad bsdus nas bris// dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dA pa k+Shar shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun bla ma chen 
259b8(rgyud 'grel): po de nyid kyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa ye shes byang chub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//

262b8(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po de phyugs dang 'dra zhe'o// bla ma la bcu pa las kyang // slob dpon la ni smad pa de// yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang // gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis// rmongs chen de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
263a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po med dang sprul gdug dang // chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang // gdon dang log 'dren rnams kyis kyang // bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro// nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni// 
263a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sems dkrugs mi bya ste// gal te rmongs pas byed 'gyur na// dmyal bar nges par 'tshe bar nges// mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i// dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa// slob dpon la ni smod 
263a3(rgyud 'grel): pa// der ni gnas par yang dag bshad// thugs thin pa'i rgyud las kyang // dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa las// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byin gyis brlabs par mi mdzad de/ 
263a4(rgyud 'grel): spos dang me tog la sogs pa// phul yang bzhes par mi 'gyur te// nad dang dug dang dgra rnams kyis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhe'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro 
263a5(rgyud 'grel): ma sgyu ma bde mchog las kyang // dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor bcas// 
263a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag las ni snying ring nas// snying nas khrag chen drangs nas 'thung zhe'o// yang de nyid las/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang // dam tshig rnam par spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrub 
263a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang ci yang mi 'grub po zhe'o// phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud lang/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' dang // sdang sems ldan pa de dag ni// mgo ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 
263a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gems zhe'o// yang mtshams med lnga byas pa'i sdig pa ni bla'i// gsang sngags log par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no// gzhan las ni/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' ba// bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/ 
263b1(rgyud 'grel): man med shin tu mi bzad sogs// bcu drug dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur na'o// ye shes grub pa las babs ni// dam tshig nyams pa sdug bsngal zhing // lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni// de'i yon tan nyams 'gyur/ 
263b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing // myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur// she nas dmyal ba'i sprul bsngal ni// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu// myong nas gnas las 'pho 'byung bas// gdol pa'am dman pa'i rigs su myo// lkugs par 
263b3(rgyud 'grel): skye'am yang na 'on par skyena'o// de khon nyid bsdus pa'i d+h+rU las// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed ce'o// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang // drag po'i dam tshig 
263b4(rgyud 'grel): mdung rtsi dang // ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pas// gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying // rtag tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur zhe'o// gal te dam tshig 'di las 'das myur na// pagasod 'gro ba yin pa 
263b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang // 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ dam tshig nyams na ston che bas na lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi btang bar bsrung bar bya'o// 
263b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba yang don che ste// dpal 'khor lalo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang // 'gro ba'i don dang de don du// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas nas// bsod nams gtsang sbra 
263b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung gang // bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po// stong phrag brgya yi kha min par// kha cig gis kyang brjod par mi nus she'o// gzhan las ni/ dam tshig sdom pa 'di rnams kun// tshul bzhin bsrung dang sgrus 
263b8(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes gyur nas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'byung na'o// dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje s+t+waM// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhe'o// phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba su 
264a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyud las kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcas pa yis// brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang // spyod pa bzlas pa'i gzhi rnams la// gal te gnas na de yi tshe// sngags pas 
264a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sngags bsgrub bzhi'o// slob dpon rdo rje gzhad pa'i sgrub thabs las// sngags pas rnam pa 'di dag gis// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyis// rdo rje gsung nyid thob/ 
264a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur zhe'o// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang / gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub sems dpar mi 'gyur te/ 
264a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba 'dus pa la dga' zhing de'i dam tshig la gnas shing bsgrubs na tshe 'di nyid la mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam par snang mdzad sgra 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam 
264a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor te/ lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas// nga yi snyam pa'i gzi bskyod gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan pa tshad la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur zhe'o// gzhung 
264a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las thabs kyi dam tshig thams cad la spyod cing mi nyams par bsrungs la/ shes rab kyis bsrungs du med par shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa mchog ces bya'o// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i 
264a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las// rnam par mi rtog las byung ba'i// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa mchog 'di bla med pa// mchog tu blar bur sgrub par byed// rigs ngan rme sha can la sogs// gsod pa don du 
264a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ba rnams// theg pa bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med pa la sogs pa yis// sems can dag gis bsrubs na 'grub// srog gcod pa'i sems can rnams/ 
264b1(rgyud 'grel): brdzun du smra bar dad pa dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa dag/ de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur zhe'o// ye shes grub pa las// de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yang ngo'i zla ba ji
264b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// rims kyis yang dag 'phel 'gyur gyis// nam yang 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dman pa la la zhig/ sangs rgyas thob par ma gyur kyang // 'khor los sgyur rgyal bde ba ni// skye ba kun tu 
264b3(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams ni// phyogs bcu dus gsum yod pa rnams// de yi pa spu'i khung bu zhes// rgyal ba mchog gi rab tu gsungs// zhe'o/ le'u brgyad pa las/ sems can/ 
264b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnyen gcig pas// rnam pa slu ba med pa'i sems// de bas brtan pa bskyed par bya// 'di byas pa yis rdzogs sangs rgyas// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes// bdud dang bgegs// /

265a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad byed pa yin no// yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni su'i spyi gtsug na yod pa la 'gro ba gang gis kyang bar mi chad do// de bzhin du sngags pa gang zhig sdom 
265a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dam tshig gis nor bus sgo gsum brgyan pa la bdud la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar du mi chod do// yang skyes bu mig dang rkang par ldan pa ni gang 'gro ba'i gnas su phyin cing dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do// / 
265a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i dam tshig mig dang 'dra ba dang spyod pa'i dam tshig rkang pa dang 'dra ba la brten te ye shes kyi lam srong du zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don lhun gyis grub par 
265a4(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'gyur ro// yang dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs la sman 'bral bar dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de gang gis rnyed pa de ni dug dang nad la sogs pa rtsa ba nas 'byin cing tshe ring ba yang 'grub bo// 
265a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs nor bu rin po che'i nor bu blangs te/ las dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig dam tshig rnams kyi sman thob pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags dang nyon 
265a6(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi zhing byang la bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mi 'chi ba'i tshe yang 'thob bo// dper na ded dpon bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang thabs dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/

265b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dag gis dam tshig dang sdom pa mtha' dag tshul bzhin bsrungs la/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs dang mthun par dgongs pa'i gnas su/ rnam lhun gyis grub pa'i bar du/

268b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus kyi// blo gros gtsug lag legs gnas te// kud rakhyen dgos 'dod spyod par shog/ rgya gang shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+ha ti tsan+das mdzad de rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//

269a7(rgyud 'grel): chang rdza'i them bu gtad mi bya// de bzhi byol song phag gi rgyu// 'dir yang tshe thung dngos grub 'gyang // mthon po'i kha nas lngar mi bya// chags mig sob bcag mi bya// gzha gzhan la brjod mi bya//

269b8(rgyud 'grel): smre bshags bya// maN+Dal dbul zhing bzod gsol bya// brgya pa bcu rtsa brgyad dang ni lnga bcu nyer gcig bdun dag dang // lan gcig brjod pas 'dab par gsungs// yid la 'gyor dang maN+Dal dang /

271a1(rgyud 'grel): yod pas dge ba'i las la mi 'bad na// de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrungs yin// shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na// brtags pas btsam bu don med glen pa yin//

273b1(rgyud 'grel): tan ji snyed cig/ brjod kyang rang gi don la phan med 'gyur// gzhan yang shes nas dam chos ma spyad na// rgya mtsho'i nang du skom nas shi ba 'dra// gzhan yang khe phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa// rin chen rnyed kyang spang ba// / 
273b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra zhes gsungs// dper na sman mkhan nad la ma btang dang // dbul mos phyug pa'i nor bgrangs pa dang 'dra// lam rgyus shes kyang ma phyin 'dra zhes gsungs// de bas 'gro ba kun kyang chos la gzung // 
273b3(rgyud 'grel): pham bu tsha gnyen 'dun thams cad dang // 'khor g.yog las kyi 'brel pa thams cad kun// gros btab gal gyis bcud de dge la gzung // chos la zung na byang chub spyod pa yin// dge ba nyams chung 
273b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa stobs chen dag/ bla med byang chub sems ni ma bskyed par// dge ba gzhan gyis zil gyis mi gnon pas// 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams shing nyam thag pa'o// bdag gzhan mi bde bsal 
273b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod pa des// byang chub sems gnyis rtag tu btang mi bya// sdig med dge ba'i sems dang ldan de la// bder gshegs rnams kyi sras su dgongs pa dang // lha mi dgongs pa kun gyis phyag bya'i 'os// 
273b6(rgyud 'grel): mdor na byang chub rnam pa gsum dgongs te// dang por smon dgos bar du 'jug kyang dgos// tha mer don de nyid la gnas par bya// smon kyang ma zhugs don la ma gnas na// yid smon byas pas 'bras bu mi 
273b7(rgyud 'grel): thob pas// byang chub spyod parlabs chen spyad par bya// rgyu ni dka' ba dang du ma blangs par// 'bras bu byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te// gang la sbyin par mchog tu btang dga' ba// yan lag kun gyi dung 
273b8(rgyud 'grel): po mgo bo yin// sbyin par gtong ba rgyal po zla 'od yin// de bzhin spyang na byang chub thob par 'gyur// de phyir 'khor ba'i chos 'di gtan du spang // mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol// 
274a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// sa ni dang po rab tu dga' ba thob// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa yang thob// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs 
274a2(rgyud 'grel): na// gsum pa 'od byed pa yis yang thob// brtson 'grus pa rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yi sa yang thob// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// lnga pa shin tu sbyang dka'i sa// 
274a3(rgyud 'grel): yang thob// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// drag pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa yang thob// thabs kyi pha rol byin pa yongs rdzogs na// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa yang thob// smon lam pha rol phyin pa yongs 
274a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs na// brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yis yang thob// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa yang thob// ye shes pha rol byin pa yongs rdzogs na// bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyis 
274a5(rgyud 'grel): sa yang zab// 'bras bu sku gsum ldan gyis grub par 'gyur// ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis su// byang chub mchog tu thugs ni bskyed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' spyod brlabs po che// rim par/ 
274a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas 'bras bu thob pa ltar// de bzhin bdag dang gzhan la phan don du// sems bskyed nas ni dge ba gzhung du spyod// de ltar dam chis gzhung du spyad pa na// nyon mongs 'chi bdag bdud ni 'joms pa 'i// 
274a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyang ni de yin no// de phyir dam chos gzhung bzhin spyad par bya// chos gzhung mi spyod chos pa'i ming ci yod// tshul khrims mi bsrung dge slong ci la zer// dam tshig med na sngags pa gang la brer// sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang 
274a8(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// dge ba chung yang dang du blang bar bya// mdor na tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi// gzhan don spyad na bdag don chud me ze// da phyir sgrib gnyis spangs la tshogs gnyis bsgrub// ston pa'i bdag dang 
274b1(rgyud 'grel): don du mthun byed cing // chags med dge bar gtong ba'i gang zag ni// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yin pas na// de la phrag dog dbang gis sgro skur zhing // thabs kyis smodan byed 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltar// 
274b2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i don la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis// nyon mongs 'du 'dzi med pa'i dge gnas na// mtshan mo stod smad dge la gnas nas ni// gung la nyal tshe dge dran 'phro la nyal// de yis bag chags dge la gnas// 
274b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// bag chags rtag par gnas na dang po'i drod// yin pas dge ba nyams 'og chud de bya// zas kyang chags phyir ma yin rgyags phyir min// dge rtags bya phyir tshod ni zin par bza'// rgod dang 'gyod// 
274b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang // gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste// sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dge ba'i nor// 'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags par rig par mdzod// ston pa'i bka' la brdzun pa mnga' bas// 
274b5(rgyud 'grel): the tshom nem nur yid gnyis mi bya'o// don la spyad cing tshig phyir mi 'brang ste// don ni gser 'dra tshig ni sgron ma bzhin// gser rnyed nas ni sgron ma gdeg mi dgos// don la spyad cing bsgoms na rang rig ste/ 
274b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig phyir nyan cing 'chad pa mang byas kyang // rang rig mi skye nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu// mdor na theg pa kun la blo sbyangs te// nges pa gcig la zhugs te mi sgrub par// yo rngam zos nas byang chub 'khrul pa ste// 
274b7(rgyud 'grel): des ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyang rang gi nyams dang spyad cing spyad// 'bras bu gong mchel gtang byas ni// nyams kyis mi lcogs bzhin du khas len pa// thang stong sdig pa rang gis blangs pa yin// 
274b8(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'i grangs ni gcig tu ma nges la// theg pa'i khyad par shes rab ci chung ste// nyams 'og chud par spyad na chud mi za// dam chos gzhung du spyod pa'i med la// dam can kun kyang ma bskul rang bzhin 'gro 
275a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa chen po'i mthu ni nyi shar 'dra// 'gro ba kun kyang dad cing 'dun pas na// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyis dge ba la// thun mong dag tu spong len med par bya// spong len byas na ston 
275a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bka' dang 'gal// theg chen sgor zhugs gang zag rnams kyis kyang // shes rab snying rje gnyis kyis gzhi gzung ste// thams cad dbyer med rtog pa shes rab yin// kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje 
275a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// de gnyis mi ldan theg chen mkhas che ba// long sbrang rgyal po yin zhes zer te brdzun// da lta'i gang zag sngags kyi sgor zhugs pas// gsang sngags zab mo nor rdzas brnyan mar btsongs// 'khor ba'i/ 
275a4(rgyud 'grel): bu tsha pho mo khyim thab byed// gsang sngags shes pas bdag phung snying re rje// des ni tsan dan sol bar 'tshong ba dang // gser phye spang phyer 'tshong dang 'dra bar gsungs// gzhan yang dad pa can gyi nor blangs 
275a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// dge bar ma spyad mi chos nor du spyad// 'bras bu dag ni rnga mo'i lus su skye// de yi nor la nor bdag longs spyod bya// spyod res sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur// lcags rdo dngul rdo bzhu ru 
275a6(rgyud 'grel): btub pas na// dad po can gyi nor ni bzhur mi btub// tshig tsam ma yin sems kyis mnyam pa nyid// rtogs nas klong du gyur cing drod ldan dang // chags med dge bar spyod pa'i gang zag gis// ma byin blangs// / 
275a7(rgyud 'grel): nas spyad kyang mi sgrib bo// mdor na sngags kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung // bya ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni// thun mong bslab pa bzhi po nyams mi bya// bla med rnam gsum mchod cing bla ma bkur// grogs la gdung 
275a8(rgyud 'grel): zhing mi thun kha zas spang // mtshan mar byas shing lha la phul ba yis// khrus la brtson pa bskyed cing lus spyod bzang // ma nyams bsrungs na rigs gsum dngos grub thob// rnal 'byor phyi ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// / 
275b1(rgyud 'grel): spyi yi dam tshig gsum po nyams mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug ni gzhung du bsrung // yan lag dam tshig gsum dang ldan par bya// ma nyams bsrungs na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor nang pa'i dam tshig bstan 
275b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// dam tshig bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang // mdo ru bsdus na rtsa ba gsum du 'dus// lus srog skyed pa'i dus gsum pha ma dang // ma rig sgo 'byed 'dren ston slob dpon dang // dam pas 'brel pa'i 
275b3(rgyud 'grel): grogs mched rnams la ni// lus ngag yid gsum don dang mthun par bsrung // yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g.yel mi bya// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres snod med la// 
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i man ngag spel bar mi bya'o// da lta gang zag sngags par khas 'ches nas// skra'i dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar// pha ma spong rdung bla ma smod mi 'khur// phrag dog dbang gis grogs la brtse gdung 
275b5(rgyud 'grel): gcad// ngan song gnas su the tsom med par 'gro// gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar// ting 'dzin 'dod sgrub 'dzab tu rna 'cha' zhing // phyag rgyar ma byin zas nor len byed pa'i// sngags par khas
275b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ches 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung // gsang sngags zab mo dgon par mi spyod par// snad dang mi ldan nyan mi rnyed thang la// beg rtse bcas nas man ngag lhug par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa 
275b7(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar skye// gsang sngags gab pa'i don rnams ma rtogs par// dam med mi nag khral theg kun bsdus nas// sbas pa'i gsang ba mngon sum 'chol par spyod// bka' dang 'gal bas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar
275b8(rgyud 'grel): lhung // dang por dam tshig gzhung du mi srung dang // bar du dbang rnams rim par mi nod dang // tha mar bka' gzhung bzhin du mi sgrub par// sngags par khas 'ches gang zag snying re rje// bza' shing ra bar 
276a1(rgyud 'grel): dug gi sdong skyes nas// drag des bza' shing byin yang med byed pas// bdag pos drug de ngo ni shes mthag/ rtsa nas phyung ste myur du med byed ltar// gang zhig rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dang / 
276a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dres nyams 'gyur ba nyes pa 'phel 'gyur bas// don rig nas ni myung du spang bar bya// dper na'o mthung ngu'i theg pa gcig/ rul pas 'o ma kun kyang 'drul ba bzhin// dam nyams snad na de dang ma 'dres na// 
276a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa de dang de ni 'dra bar gsungs// de bas lung gcig tshu la'ang mi btud ngo // dam tshigs gzhi 'dra ste kun gyi rten// dam tshig nor bur 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung // dam tshig mkhar dang 'dra ste 'jigs pa skyog/ 
276a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gru dang 'dra ste chu bo sgrol// mdor na chos kyi rtsa ba dam tshig gsungs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyis sems la 'jog/ rnam smin gzhan ni khad dang rims kyis smin// gsang sngags thun mong mo 
276a5(rgyud 'grel): yin rnam smin drag/ sgyu mar sprul zhugs bzhin du 'gro'o zhes// gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun las gsal bar 'byung // gang zag sngags par khas len rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 
276a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsum// dam tshig dbang dang mchod pa'i sgor zhugs nas// rang nyid zab mo'i don dang ldan par bya// theg pa 'og ma'i sgor zhugs bsrung sdom dang // chos spyod byed pa mi dgag mi smod do// ci phyir chos
276a7(rgyud 'grel): la spong len phyogs ris dang // bzang ngan gnyis su ston pas ma gsungs pas// 'di ltar snod pa'i chos 'di thams cad la// gnyis med mnyam pa chen por rtogs pa ni// 'bad rtsol ci byas dge bar gyur pas na// 
276a8(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba phyogs ris med par bya'o// da lha'i gang zag theg pa 'og ma pa'i// rgyu 'bras don la zhen pa kha cig ni// gsang sngags zab mo'i don rnams ma rtogs par// sngags kyi stan 'gan chos spyod 'phrigs 
276b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong na// ban de log chos spyod cing rtsing chos byed// gsang sngags dang chos min ston pas ma gsungs zer// man ngag zab mo'i don la skur btab pas// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal ba'i yang gting du// 
276b2(rgyud 'grel): skye bar gyur pas rmongs pa snying re rje// ston pa'i zhal nas nges par gsungs pa yi// man ngag don dam gsang sngags zab mo la// bka' slad gzhung bzhin dang du mi len par// mtshan nyid chos spyod dag la blo zhen 
276b3(rgyud 'grel): pas// bskal pa gsum du sangs rgyas zhal mi mthong // skal ba chung zhing shes rab zhan pa dang // blo ngan don la rmongs pa'i gang zag gis// zab mo'i don la ma zhugs skur pa btab// rnam smin dpag 
276b4(rgyud 'grel): gis mi lang brjod las 'das// gsang sngags zab mo'i don la yid ches nas// lta spyod dam tshig gzhung du ldan pa dang // sgrub la shin tu brtson pa'i gang zag ni// sangs rgyal sa la the tshom med par 'gro// 
276b5(rgyud 'grel): skye bo ma rig chos la gzung ba dang // tshes pa chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi// don du bdag gis yi ge 'di brtsams pas// kun kyang dad cing don la 'jug par smon// zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 
276b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyal po chen po nam thos sras kyi sgru thabs sleb dpon tho bzang snying pos mdzad pa bzhugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza bai shrA ba Na sA d+ha naM// bod skad du/ rgyal po/ 
276b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnam thos sras kyi sgrub thabs// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba// gnod sbyin kun gyi nar 'chang kun gyi rje// byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos 
276b8(rgyud 'grel): sras// dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal te// ngal gso dge ba stobs po che// sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs// phyag gnyis be con ne'u le bsnams// de sgrub tshe ga bshad par bya// 
277a1(rgyud 'grel): ga pur la sogs lci ba yis// sngags brjod sa gzhi legs par byug/ tshom bu dgur ni me tog dgod// dam tshig bdun dang ldan pa yis// rgyal po'i rten gsum gzugs par bya// bdag nyid // 
277a2(rgyud 'grel): ga rdzogs byas la// sngags brgya bcu pa gsum bzlas pas// phyogs mtshams kun tu bsang gtor bya// snying gar sa bon bsams pa las// byang phyogs 'od zer rab spros te// gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso/ 
277a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rnam thos spyan drangs te// mdun du legs par bzhugs par bsam// de la bsang gtor nas brtsams te// rgyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod// oM a mra ta kun+d+ha laM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de la 
277a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i yi ge la// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yis// so sor legs par sbyar te dbul// spyi gtsug lkog ma snying ga yi// oM A hUM gi 'od zer gyis// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'od zhu stong pa'i rang 
277a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya// de nas mdun du bruM las ni// rin chen khang pa brtsegs par bsgom// zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs pa// dbus ma'i pho brang gsum brtsegs te// rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed 
277a6(rgyud 'grel): pas bskor// shar phyogs shel dang bai DUr+ya// pad+ma rA ga gser gyi ni// ka ba stong phrag bcu yis brgyan// de yis phyi rol phyogs mtshams su// bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing // rin chen rdzing bu 'dod 'dze// 
277a7(rgyud 'grel): ba// brgyad brgyad lnga yis rab tu mdzes// rin chen 'bar bas yongs su bskor// dbus su sa bon yi ge las// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'phros nas// don byas slar 'dus bai la thim// de las rgyal chen 'khor 
277a8(rgyud 'grel): bcas rdzogs// rin chen po brang dam pa dang // mi 'jigs seng+ge'i gdan steng na// baM las byung ba'i mgon po ni// ngal gso dge ba stobs po che// g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon na gter gyi ne'u le/ 
277b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// sku ni gser gyi 'od pas mdzes// zhal nas rin chen char 'bebs// thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol mdzad// skul rin chen rgyan gyis spras// phrag gong g.yas g.yon nyi zlas brgyan// nyi ma 
277b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bum gyi gzi mdangs can// dbu la rin chen brgyan gyis spras// gnod sbyin bye ba'i 'khor rnams dang // nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam// nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa// sems dpa'i// 
277b3(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te// mgon po kun gshegs dam tshig can// da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus// mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing // thams cad nyon mongs 'dam 'bying 
277b4(rgyud 'grel): sar // gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang // shAkya seng+ge'i spyan sngar khyod// thugs dam gang bzhes de dgongs la// 'dren pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang // sems can kun la sman slad du// 
277b5(rgyud 'grel): byar phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams// sems can don phyir gshegs su gsol// phyag na rdo rje thugs gnas pa'i// hUM las spros pa'i 'od rnams kyis// rang bzhin rgyal po rnam thos sras// gnod sbyin 
277b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bum bcas bkug nas ni// nor bu'i grong khyer de dbus su// mdun gnas rgyal ba de la bzhugs// rin chen dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te// rin chen bdun dang 
277b7(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis brgyad// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis mchod// gu gul dud pa dbul zhing bstod// de nas thugs ka'i zla ba la// sa bon sngags kyis yongs bskor te// lce la rdo rje spu gur bsam// sngags kyi 
277b8(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa s+pho sngu ni// so so'i thugs kar dmigs la bzlas// tad+ya thA/ oM hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ 
278a1(rgyud 'grel): tu ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru su ra ma b+ha/ tsunga? ma Ni b+had/ tsung chung parti b+haH/ oM e h+ye hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA ba ta ra tiSh+Tha ba tar tiSh+Tha me tsa ya/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha ni su te ne/ sur me ne/ su pa de re/ su su sh+ye 
278a2(rgyud 'grel): hi li mi laM swA hA/ hUM bai shra baNA ye swA hA/ 'di brjod bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu// zla ba yang ngo'i bco lnga la// tsan den dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas// der ni rgyal po la dmigs nas// a ka ru bsregs sngags 
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas byas// 'dir ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// nyin dang mtshan mo lan drug tu// rgyal po la dmigs bzlas na// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyid// dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du// gnod sbyin rnams kyis 
278a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar byed// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // kha na ma tho med pa yi// zas dang sgom dang bca' ba dang // nor bu dbyig dang gser stsal bgyid// rin po che yi gter la sogs// bsod nams 
278a5(rgyud 'grel): tshad med 'grub par 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub// de la sogs pa ma lus 'grub// ngal bar gyur na gshegs su gsol// mchod bstod bzod par gsol ba dang // dkar gtor gtang la phrin
278a6(rgyud 'grel): las bcol// bruM la sogs pa'i snod bskyed la// khaM las zhal zas bskyed par bya// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ha nut+pan+da trad oM A hUM/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis spel byas la// sngags rgyal bcu 
278a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa bzlas bya// hUM bai shra pa Na ye i dam ba liM grih+nan du sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu mA ma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma sA d+hu a mo g+ha swA hA/ so so'i sngags la btags la dbul// hUM byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam 
278a8(rgyud 'grel): thos sras// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes nas kyang // bdag cag 'khor dang bcis pa la// bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar mi dzod// bdag la gnod par sems pa yi// log par zhugs pa'i sems can kun/ 
278b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i phru ma gzhom pa dang // gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod// bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis bsring// snying ga'i lcags kyu bkrol la gshegs// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun 
278b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub gsol// byang phyogs gnas su gshegs nas kyang // slar yang gyon par mdzad du gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' 'od du bya// rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas pa la// rang bzhin rgyal po bkug sa 
278b3(rgyud 'grel): bstim// zhabs kyis mnan la dbang du bsdu// hUM be shra waN+DA ye a nu ra tsa ku ru hUM// de ltar rdzogs par byang gyur na// rgyal po rnam thos sras bcas kyis// 'dod pa thams cad bskong bar byed// 
278b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' brnyes 'gyur// slob dpon chen po po 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i rnam sras kyi bde byed kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta te dza de ba dang bod kyi lo tsa ba 
278b5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// / ba zh-i nam thos kya kyims brtag pa'i d+hA []/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ mahA rA dza bi run karma kal+la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgyal po 
278b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnam thos sras kyi las brtag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs gtso phyag na rdo rje yis// dngos su lung bstan byin brlabs pa'i// spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rjes ni// grags 
278b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la sogs pha rol sde// tshogs gsad stsogs las rnams ni// bla ma brgyud pa las byung ba'i// gnod sbyin rgyal po gtsor gyur pa'i// stong phrag brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa'i// de sgrub cho ga bshad par bya// 
278b8(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khro rgyal rdo rje can// sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lha sogs gdug pa gzhom pa'i phyir// dang por cho ga la 'jug bya// ske tshe yungs kar dug sna tshogs// bung bu'i chu dang spangs stsogs dang // 
279a1(rgyud 'grel): tsha dang gdug pa'i tshor spangs chus// hUM brjod sa gzhi legs par byug/ khor tsher ma can gyi shing // nam phyed byang bltas me tog blang // tshem bu ru ni legs par dgod// khrus byas bsrung ba 
279a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun byas la// sems dpa'i skyil krung bde stan la// byang du mngon phyogs 'jug par bya// de nyid rigs kyi me tog dang // sna tshogs drug phye mi rus phye// legs par sbyar ba'i de bzhin spos// mi rkang las byung / 
279a3(rgyud 'grel): mar me gtang // sa lu dmar po sha lnga sogs// gcig tu byas pa'i lha bshos dang // mi dang bong bu'i dri chu dang // rma bya'i sgra dang ku shar bcas// bsang gtor dri'i chu dang ldan// sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas/ 
279a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// phyogs mtshams kun tu bsang gtor bya// de nas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa// gdong bkrus nas brtsams thabs gzhung // bdag nyid chog rdzogs byas la// yi ge bcu gsum bzlas pa ni// bum phrag 
279a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bzlas byas na// snying kar yi ge bsam pa las// 'od zer byang du rab 'phros te// gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso// klu chen brgyad kyis skor ba yi// rnam thos rgyal po spyan drangs te// mdun gyi dkyil/ 
279a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor steng du ni// rim pas legs par bzhugs par bsam// de la bsang gtor nas brtsams te// gong gi mchod pa'i rim pa yis// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa rnams// rgyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod//

279b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ka/ ma hA yak+Sha rA dza/ aSh+Ta nA ga bi ra be sha sarba yak+Sha ba ri// b+ha ra i dam ba ling grih+na nA// sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma/ sa da a mu ka ma ra ya hUM phaT sA tA/ yi ge bco lnga sngags la/ 
279b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// btags te gtor ma dbul bar bya// de nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la// hU~M khrom gyi phyi rol du// yi ge bcu gsum bskor bar bya// yungs kar dang bcas 
279b7(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor gzhag/ bla rtsi ba'i rnam lnga la// gos sngon can gyi sngags bzlas te// mgo lus khyab par byas la bsrung // de nas rten 'brel sngags kyis ni// lus la go cha dgod par b+ha// spyi bo lkog ma snying 
279b8(rgyud 'grel): gdu// kha dog sum ldan yi ge bsam// so sor sngags kyis bskor ba bya// thugs kar zla ba la gnas hUM// de la sngags kyis yongs bskor te// lcel rdo rje sbu gu bsam// spro bsku'i sngags kyis bzlas ni/

280a2(rgyud 'grel): yak+Sha rA dza ku be ra bi ru rA sid+d+him+me pra ya ts+tsha hU~M hUM b+h+rUM phaT/ 'di brjod bsnyen pa 'bur phrag gtsag/ rdzogs nas rna ltas 'byung ba ste// chu bo sems dang sprul mthong ngam// dgra khyim nagasal me mched mthong /

289a2(rgyud 'grel): las la sbyar bar bya// pho dang mo yi dbang po dang // 'khor lo las la sbyar bar bya// zangs las sred pa'i mes po bya// lto bar skyes pa'i pho mtshan gzhug/ rtsa ba'i sngags la las sngags gdags//

289a4(rgyud 'grel): las sbyor sngags de zhag gsum gdab// gsal shing rtse la phyar byas nas// skyes pa 'du ba'i sar phyir na// lha rnams tshogs par gyur pa na// brgya byin mdzes pa lta bu ru// skyes pa thams cad sems 'dus 
289a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// bkur sti phun sum tshogs par byed// yid 'phrog sngags ni 'di yin no// oM ga na ma ga Na dz+nyA ya swA hA/ oM ba ba/ saM se khang khang / yer yer/ rang rab tshur mi/ ha sa mang kha mi/ skyes pa'i tshogs la 
289a6(rgyud 'grel): shaM ku ru ye swA hA/ 'khor lo las la sbyor ba na// mdun du zangs kyi maN+Dal khar// mda' bzhi btsugs la 'khor sbyang dang // yul dang grong dang rgyal blon tshogs// 'khor lo 'od zer lcags kyu yis// 
289a7(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang med par 'gugs par bsam// sngags kyi 'od zer zhag gsum mo// srid gsum dbang sdud las sbyor yin// de nas gtor ma phul byas la// bstod pa bya zhing bzod gsol dbul// ye shes 
289a8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs la dam tshig bsdu// mis ma mthong bar sba bar bya// skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe// mchod bstod gtor ma gtang bar bya// de ltar brtson 'grus ldan gyur na// gang bsam pa ni 'grub 'gyur zhing / 
289b1(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'dod pa char du 'beb// 'di brtsams dge ba ci yod pas// byang chub spyod pa la zhugs nas// sems can rnams kyi don byed shog/ tshogs kyi bdag po spre'i'u mgo can gyi sgrub thabs/ dpal dngos 
289b2(rgyud 'grel): grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzad mdzad pa rdzogs so// / slad kyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsa ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// tshogs bdag gi phyi sgrub grista dkar po/ 
289b3(rgyud 'grel): nang sgrub chags pa rdo rje/ gsang sgrub spre'u'i dbu can rnams dang / gzhan yang tshogs bdag dmar po phyag bcu gnyis pa/ tshogs bdag sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba sngon po phyag bzhi pa rnams bla ma chos 
289b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal bzang pos bdag la gnang ngo // / rgya gar skad du/ a d+ya ga Na ba te rA ga badz+ra sa ma ya stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po chags pa rdo rje'adam tshig gi bstod pa 
289b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ rje btsun spyan ram gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal dpas ldan tshogs bdag dgyes// phyag 'tshas dpang ldan zhi bskye// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan khro bo che// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni// ci 'dod par ni 
289b6(rgyud 'grel): stsol bar mdzod// lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni// sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad// shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas// tshogs bdag chen po thugs rje che// thugs rje chen pos dbul ba skyabs// 
289b7(rgyud 'grel): nor la chen po khyod nyid la// bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan tshogs bdag chen po ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa// glang chen byi la spre'u'i zhal// la phug ral gri rin chen dang / 
289b8(rgyud 'grel): chang snod la du dgra sta 'dzin// brkyang bskum skyil krung yum stengs bzhugs// zhal na nga rin chen char pa 'bebs// sgrub pa po yi dbul ba sel// gsus chen rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// phyag 
290a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal dpal tshogs bdag la'o// chang dang la dul phug dang // 'bras chan kur ba'i gtor ma bzhes// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // nad dang 'byung ba zhi bar mdzod// 
290a2(rgyud 'grel): mi dang 'byung po gnod sbyin bdud// thams cad bran du 'gyur bar shog/ lha yi longs spyod mang po las// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung bar shog/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang phyug can// gdul ba'i dbang
290a3(rgyud 'grel): gis sku sprul pa// lha chen tshogs bdag chen po ste// 'jig rten 'dir yang bsrung ba dang // byang chub thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig/ ces bstod la gsol ba gdab ste bzlas pa thon nas gtor ma dbul bar
290a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po chags pa rdo rje dam chog gi stong pa paN+Di ta dI paM kar shrid+d+hi nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Dita chen po de nyid dang / lo tsa ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bskung ba'o// 
290a5(rgyud 'grel): srin pa sngon ma chags kyi ga po byu shes bya par gas ga/ @#/ rgya gang skad du/ me g+ha A lo ka ga Na pa ti sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ sprin gyi sgron ma tshogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ tshogs kyi 
290a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// khro rgyal khyu mchog phongs pa sel/ mdog sngo de la bdag btud de// gter gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i// sgrub thabs bdag gi legs rtogs dang // rgyud dang man ngag legs 
290a7(rgyud 'grel): dran pas// yang dag bdag gis bshad par bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// yid 'ong legs pa'i gnas dag du// sngar langs khrus byas mame tog gtor// tsan+dan chu yis maN+Dal bya// me tog 
290a8(rgyud 'grel): dri zhimatshom bu dgram// de nas rang nyid yi ge maM// de las 'od 'phros spyan drangs la// mchod cing gu gul nag po'i spos// btang zhing 'od kyi ngo bor bzhu// rang snying nang du legs par gzhug/ de yis 
290b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis bdag nyid kyang // zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa// dbu la ral pa'i cod pan te// zla chos dang ldan sprul gyis brgyan// phyag g.yas dgra sta mche ba dang // g.yon 
290b2(rgyud 'grel): brtse gsum zhags pa bsnams// stag gi lpags pas smad dkris shing // klu rgyal dkar ba'i do shal can// 'od zer tshogs ldan de bsgom bya// rin chen rten la ye shes gzhug/ mchod pa bya zhing yi dgas 'jig/

290b5(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs// de ltar btus pa'i rig pa de// nyin re khri tsho re re dang // gu gul nag po'i ri lul// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya// de ltar 'bab pas zla re la// dong rtse 'bum 'bum rnyed par byed// rgyal gyi nyin 
290b6(rgyud 'grel): par sngar langs nas// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma dang // dri zhim spos kyis legs par mchod// rten ni gtsang ma'i gzhi 'am ni// khyu mchog lpags pa'i gzhi la ni// sgrub pas mtshon gang gong gzugs bri// 
290b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gyi nyin par rdzogs pa la// rmugs 'dzin rgyal po khyod kyis mdzad// zhes brjod gar yang bcang bar bya// za ma tog ga nang du ni// me tog bzang dang dri bzangs kyis// legs par bsdams nas der gnas 
290b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// rtag par de la mchod bya ste// rgya chen tshogs kyis legs par mchod// de ltar rgyun du byas pa yis// gter chen thams cad thob pa dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dun par 'gyur// kun lags pa 
291a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing gtsang sbrar ldan// 'di ni 'di yi dam tshig go/ 'di la 'bad gyur thams cad la// gter gyi re ba bskar ba dang // dus rnams kun tu khyod kyis gzigs// zhes ni legs par rtogs 
291a2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// tshogs bdag 'jigs gzugs gsal ba yi// sgrub thabs gter gyi sgron ma 'di// 'gro rnams phongs las grol ba dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ tshogs kyi bdag po sprin gyi

291a4(rgyud 'grel): du sa nga [] 'tha / #/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI A dz+nyA bi naM pa trag Na pi ti sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal tshogs kyi bdag po 'jung bgegs sel ba zhes

291b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa zed cing sgrub pa po'i// dbul ba sel zhing re ba bskong // skar chen dag la bri bar bya// de yi logs bzhir rig wang gis// tad+ya thA/ na maHsU te ga Na pa ti/ kaT+Ta kaT+Ta/ maN+Da maH/ raT+Ta raD+ha/ da ha da ha/ 
291b2(rgyud 'grel): grih+na grih+Na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ na maHstu te/ ga Na pa ti du ru tsa na ya swA hA/ oM a b+h+r-i tra bi na bu kha nAn+de d+ha ra b+hA ma gats+tsha ti/ ha ha ya/ ma hA ha ti kr-i ta nan pra ye ma ye mi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu du mu ru/ na mo na ma 
291b3(rgyud 'grel): swAn/ tshang re ming dang spel ba bri// de rgyab gzung rings bri bar bya// rab tu gnas pa de yi mdun// maN+Dal dkar po 'dab brgyad la// tsan+dan chu yis byugs pa'i steng // me tog dkar po sel mar bkram/ 
291b4(rgyud 'grel): tiswA hA/ zhes pa grangs kyi rtags pa dang sbyar// zla ba gcig gis nges par 'grub// de nas sku gzugs mchod byas la// dang du dril la mi yi rkang // dbus su bcug la tho rings kha// lag pas btsugs te/ 
291b5(rgyud 'grel): gtong ma sbyin// oM gaM ga Na pa ti rat+na sid+d+hi/ ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga/ ga Na pa ti swA hA/ oM gaM ga Na pa taM ba laM ta khA hi khA hi/ bdun gyis sngags la dbul bar bya// de nas bstod pa sngags 'di bya// oM ga Na pa ti/ 
291b6(rgyud 'grel): ra t+tA rat+na rat+na sid+d+hi mA ma ro d+ha ro d+ha/ ga Na pa ti/ ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ka Ta ka Ta swAhI/ gaN pa ti rat+na puSh+Ti kA ra maT maT sAhA/ ga Na pa ti sid+d+hi wa shaM ku ru ra Ta ra Ta s+phAr+tha/ gaN pa ti rata na bau Sha Ta gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sAtA/ 
291b7(rgyud 'grel): babacu rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis// yid la rab rdzogs par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid thib nas// 'bad pa med par nor rnyed 'gyur// spogs mi dgos par 'grub 'gyur te// de'i phyir gtor ma 'bang 
292a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'phags pa 'jur bgegs kun sel ba'i// sgrub thabs 'di brtsams dge ba des// 'jig rten nor la dbang byed cing // bla med 'bras bu thob par shog/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi

292a3(rgyud 'grel): sa par bsgyur pa// / sar+b+bam+b+has / deg nasa'atshal ba'i sgru thabs/ 'phags pa thal zag

292a7(rgyud 'grel): byin gnyis la// zla bar yi ge bcu pa gser 'od 'phro// 'od kyis mchod dang lhar bsgyur nor bsdus skyug/ lag mthil baM las gser bu ma rin chen skyug/ mdzub mo gung mo ming med mthe'u chung dang / 
292a8(rgyud 'grel): mthe 'ong nor 'chang g.yas g.yon yi ge bcu// oM in+d+ra ni mu kha b+hU ma ri swA hA/ oM dzu luM swA hA/ rim bzhin byin gyis brlab dang dbul sngags so// phyag dang zhal dang gsang gnas nang nas phyag/ de nas zhal du dmar 
292b1(rgyud 'grel): ser chu rgyun 'jug/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA// lo phyed thun drug chu phul 'byor chen 'grub// spogs na hUM mdzad khros pas dug khrag dang /

292b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug/ gzugs brnyan snod nang 'chad byas chu dbul la// u tsu sh+ma sgrub pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa slong dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bsgyur ba'o// /

293a1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi bu gar thig le dang bral ba'i yi ge a dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba de las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// der hUM yig dbus sngo ba phyi rol kun nas cung zad ser ba/ 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro 
293a2(rgyud 'grel): ba mgo gyen du bstan pa ste/ de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ kha dog dang bya ba hUM yig dang 'dra ba ste/ lte ba'i nang du son pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM de lta bu dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas oM AHzhes bya'i
