293a7(rgyud 'grel): thuzung gi rnam pa can sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du nor sbyin ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rin po che'i dbu brgyan can/ zhal nas rin po che skyug cing gan rgyal du nyal ba'i dpral bar zhabs g.yas pa 
293a8(rgyud 'grel): dang rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du g.yon pas gnan pa/ g.yon brkyang gi gom stabs can/ gcer bu rtags gyen du bsgreng ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba thugs kar phyag g.yas na thod pa khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa la 
293b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du phyogs nas gzigs pa/ brla g.yon pa la brten pa'i phyag g.yon pas ne'u le kha nas 'og tu rin po che'i tshogs sprug pa bsnams pa snyan ma phrag cing gug pa/ zhal mche ba zla ba phyed pa lta bu gtsigs pa/ spyan dmar 
293b2(rgyud 'grel): la zlum pa dpral ba'i dbyes su khro gnyer byas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba/ dbul thub pa'i me spyod pa sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgya can gyis rgyas btab pa/ mtha' yas sngon po ta ma la'i lo ma lta bus dbu skra 
293b3(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa/ 'jog po dmar pos rna ba dkris pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar bas do shal byas pa// stobs kyi rgyu ljang gu drar ba lta bus tshangs skud byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa/ pad+ma 
293b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog kun da ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa// rigs ldan du ba'i mdog can khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ sku mdog sngon po 'od zer ser po'i tshogs 'phro ba bsgom 
293b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dpral ba dang / kha dang dpung pa g.yas g.yon dang / snying ga dang / rdo rje'i steng dang / brla g.yas g.yon dang / zhabs g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i nang gi rtsi'i bu gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rnams la/ 
293b6(rgyud 'grel): oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i mi ge ser po rnams ni 'od zer ser po can du blta bar bya'o// de'i rjes la sna'i rlung phyir 'byung ba'i dus su oM yig la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams dang / thugs ka'i 
293b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyogs thams cad du spros te reg pa tsam gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor gyur pa rnams rlung 'jug pa'i dus su hUM yig la bcug 
293b8(rgyud 'grel): la sems brten par byed pa yis brtan par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa rnams kyang klu dang / ne'u le dang / nor sbyin kha rnams su gzhug par bya'o// slar rlung / 
294a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba na klu la sogs pa rnams kyis med pa'i rin po che rnams mdun du skyug par bsgom par bya'o// de ltar yang dang yang du spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa yang ngo // de'i rjes su ngal 
294a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags sam/ yang na dgongs pa'i sngags yi ge bcu pa bzlas par bya'o// chu sbyin 
294a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su na lag pa g.yas pa gan rgyal gyi dbus su pa yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis lag pa bum pa bzang po lta bar byas la// lag pa'i rtsa bar oM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis gdu bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang / 
294a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yig gi dbus su dza dang / mdzub mo dang / ming med dang / mthe'u chung dang / mthe bo rnams kyi rtse mo la b+ha la dza len+d+ra zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams rim par ji lta bar dang / oM dang baM gi yi ge dag gi bar du ya yig dang / 
294a5(rgyud 'grel): ya yig gi g.yon dang g.yas ngos dag tu swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge dag ste/ oM yig la sogs pa 'di rnams ra nge rang gi gnas kyi bu ga rnams su zla ba la gnas pa ser po can du bsgoms nas/ lag pa'i nang du 
294a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog chu dang bcas pa kha dang nye bar byas la/ oM in+d+ra ni mu kha b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags par bya'o// de'i rjes la lag pa brkyang bas sbyin par bya ba'i chu rang gi kha
294a7(rgyud 'grel): nas zhugs pa dzaM yig gi 'od zer rnams dang / thugs ker gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis kha dog ser por byas pa rdo rje'i kha nas thon nas lag par son pa skad cig gis mdun du bcom 
294a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das zhal sngon du phyogs par bsgom pa'am/ sku gzugs kyi zhal gyi nang du oM dzaM lu swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs kyis lan bdun du dbul 
294b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya bya ba la sogs pa lan cig brjod pas 'bras rdos pa bu ram dang bsres pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gtor ma bcom ldan 'das la dngul bar bya'o// de ltar ji ltar nus par thun gsum mam/ 
294b2(rgyud 'grel): thun cig la rjes su sgrubs te/ bstod pa dang smon lam gdab par bya'o// de'i rjes la bsgoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das oM badz+ra muHzhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// gzhan yang smin drug gi zla ba 
294b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / dpyid zlang ba dang / dpyid zla tha chung dang / dbyar zla 'bring po rnams gang yang rung ba'i nya'am/ dge ba'i nyi ma gzhan la yang rngo mags pa la skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor bsgrubs te/ yang dag 
294b4(rgyud 'grel): par mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// bzo bo bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa gzung bas nyin zhag gcig nyid la dpa' bo'i yon gyis sku gzugs byed du gzhug go// byas pa la yang bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin 
294b5(rgyud 'grel): du rim pa ji lta bar bcom ldan 'das gzugs la yi ge dgod pa dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms nas/ chu sbyin pa la sogs pas mnyes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go/ de'i tshe ni gshegs su gsol bar 
294b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs kyi rnam par rtag tu bzhugs pa la bkur sti dang mchod par bya'o// paN+Di ta a b+ha ya ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa'i u tsu sh+ma dzaM b+ha la sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// 
294b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta a laM ka de ba dang / lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas chos 'khor shong ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur te ga tan la pib bo// slad kyi pir+N+Na ta mahA b+hU ta 
294b8(rgyud 'grel): tsin+da dang / chags lo tsa ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsnur cing dag par bgyis so// / ga la / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ma pA la swa d+d+he/ bod skye das/ 
295a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dza ma b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang / seng+ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis/ 
295a2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal ba// bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs// bcom ldan chab khyor gang gi mnyes 'gyur na// thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs de phyir 
295a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bshams la ma rtsi zhing // khyod dang 'dra ba la la cher rnyed par dka'// brtsi bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas// phangs par gyur pa dgal ba de mdzad na// kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong 
295a4(rgyud 'grel): sbags pa// spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags// e ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi// gzu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang // skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi/ 
295a5(rgyud 'grel): sde yis rnam par 'joms pa ji ltar lags// sems can sman slad nor bu rin po che// rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'bebs grags na// kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa// ci ste zigs pa yang //

295a7(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhir gyi// nor bu sems pa dang ldan ma lags pa// de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na// thugs rje'i bdag can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal// gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu 
295a8(rgyud 'grel): yis bdag po zhes// skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa// de la bad+ma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du// pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyid pa lags// de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan 
295b1(rgyud 'grel): sdud// cho nges btab nas bsod nams 'byam klas pa// gang yang de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du// mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog/ bcom ldan 'das dza ma b+ha la la bstod pa// slob 
295b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po btsun pa zlabs mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o// / na mo u tsuSh+Ta/ dzam b+ha la 
295b3(rgyud 'grel): oM a zhes bya bas spyan drangs// rang gi snying gar a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje rtse dgu pa de'i dbus su in+d+ra go ba dang ma nyam pa'i

295b5(rgyud 'grel): gi rnam pa khro gnyer can// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yon pas rin po che skyug pa'i ne'u le 'dzin pa/ ga yas pas khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ phyogs su mgo bstan pa'i gser 
295b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can// rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// nor gter gan rgyal du skyel ba/ zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba skyug pa'i bdag nyid las 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i tshogs 'phro bar bsam/ u tsub+ta'i 
295b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na oM yig las skyes pa'i gdu bu'o// baM yig las skyes pa'i bum pa bzang po dang 'dra ba 'bo bzhin pa/ lag pa'i dbus su dza ma yig go// mdzub mo la b+ha yig go/ gung mo la la yig go/ srin 
295b8(rgyud 'grel): lag la dza yig go/ mthe'u chung la len yig go/ mthe bo la dra yig go/ mkhrig ma la ya yig go/ de nas swA hA yig go/ 'di ni sngags dgod pa'i rim pa'o// kha sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la chu skyor 
296a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin no// oM dz+dza sAhA chu sbyor sbyin pa'i sngags so// oM a in+d+ra ya ni mu kha b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ lag pa nas kha dang kha nas lag par de dben par sbyin no// 'di ltar snying rjes sems 
296a2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad phongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i don du dzam b+ha la bsgom par bya'o// u tsush+ma dzam b+ha la zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal po Ar+ya ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

297b3(rgyud 'grel): chu sbyin par bya ste/ lag pa'i mthil du baM ser po las gser gyi bum pa bzang po rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa kha phyir bsgyel ba'i yi ge paM de nyid kyis mtshan pa blta'o// baM gyi nang du dzaM yig go// khrig ma la ni

298a1(rgyud 'grel): chog de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul ba med par sbyin par bya'o// de'i tshe phyag gi mthil gyi bum pa dang / ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang skra'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa/ 
298a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du me'i chang chen po phab pas gnas khang la sogs pa mtha' dag yod cing nor byis gang bar gyur par bsam me// de'i rjes la yi ge

298a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar zla ba drug la sogs par nyig lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bar mchad par chu smin pa la brtson par byed na/ des ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ 
298a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyu ga snying po gter bra pa las// lcags klas lug btab zas nor ster// bram ze'i tshangs sgyogs lnga tshan lngas// skad te bcud bsdus dngos grub len// rin chen snying po nyi zla dang pad+ma rab spangs 
298a8(rgyud 'grel): bde chen zag/ rim bzhin gnang sbyin ma ma// thad zag par yi snang bar bshad// dbang dab so/ grub cang dang // khyod tha 'thong martan bzhengs nas// 'di nyid rgyal ba'i nying dzi 
298b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis// dam tshig ye shes mnyam sbyor bya// rna ba mnan dang mdangs 'phrog dang // dgra bo byis pa'i gzugs 'jigs pas// rigs ngan gdug pa'i las gsum byed// khro zhal 'phrin las bgegs skrod yin// 
298b2(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal gdon 'grol char 'bebs byed// nor bdag gzir bas nor rnams 'phrog/ rigs 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed dang // 'jigs skyob kun po bsrungs pa nyid// bu ster tshe ni bsring ba dang // phyug skyong 
298b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cing gzugs pa dang // dbang bskur bkra shis gsol ba ste// rim bzhin oM nas swat+kA'i bar// 'od dang lhan cig rjes 'gro dang // slar bzlog yi ge bsu yis so// rdo rje hU~M mdzad khros pa yis//

298b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang ches gsang ba// sbas pa'i bum pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba// slob dpon nor sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo// 
298b7(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis/ bod yul dbus kyis bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// / 'gas pa ram b+ha la nag po sgru pa'i thabs bzugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza la kriSh+Na sA 
298b8(rgyud 'grel): d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dzam b+ha la nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dzam b+ha la bsgrub par 'dod pas/ yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su stan/ 
299a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang sems dpa'i go 'phang thob par byas te// sems can thams cad mtho ris dang / thar pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya// de'i ched du dza ma b+ha la la 
299a2(rgyud 'grel): chu phul la mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la/ gnas dang bdag dang / rnal 'byor bsrung ba ni gzhan dang mthun/ rang gi snying gar yi ge a dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i 
299a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor// de'i steng du yi ge hUM nang nag la phyi ser ba/ 'od zer ser po 'phro ba bsams la/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu pa hUM dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom/ de'i lte ba'i nang du hUM bsam/ hUM 
299a4(rgyud 'grel): delas 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing / ngag tra oM AHzhes brjod pas/ phyogs mtshams thams cad nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i u tsu sma bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs nas/ mdun gyi nam 
299a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la bzhugs pa la/ dad cing gus pas phyag 'tshal dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bdun rnam dag bya// tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sog pa yin/ de nas
299a6(rgyud 'grel): yang rdo rje hUM zla ba rnams las 'phros pas snod bcud la phog/ de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas la thim/ mdun gyi 'phags pa'ang oM AHzhes brjod pas rdo rje dang hUM dang tha ma dad du gyur/ rang lus kyang 'od du 
299a7(rgyud 'grel): zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim/ de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam/ de ye shes kyi tshogs sog pa yin/ rdo rje hUM zla ba u tsu sma hUM gi 'od zer/ de lnga po yongs su gyur pa las/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng 
299a8(rgyud 'grel): dra rnam thos kyi bu su mdog ser po// mgo g.yas su bstan pa/ gan rgyal du nyal ba/ kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skrag pa/ dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras pas brgyan pa/ de'i mgo thur du 
299b1(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa/ 'od zer phreng ba 'khrug cing 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar/ dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongs su gyur pa las/ u tsum+ba byis pa'i gzugs can shin du nag pa/ rna ba ma phug pa/ rna ba 
299b2(rgyud 'grel): thung ba/ skra 'am pa gyen du brdzes pa/ lus thung ba mthugs pa/ gsus pa che ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan dmar ba/ khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ spyan zlum pa/ phyag gnyis kyis g.yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 
299b3(rgyud 'grel): nu ma g.yas pa la brten cing / zhal du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsdams pa/ g.yon pa rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa'i ne'u le pus mo g.yon gyi steng du gzung ba/ zhabs g.yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa/ 
299b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang bas rkang pa mnan pa/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa/ gcer bu thor tshugs la klu mtha' yas nag pos bkris pa/ rna ba do shal/ tshad skud/ dpung pa/ lag pa/ rkeng pa/ rkang pa rnams la rim pa ltar/ 
299b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzeg po dmar po// pad+ma chen po dkar po// stobs kyi rgya sngon po/ rigs ldan khra'o// dung skyong ser po// ba su ki dkar po ste glu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la 
299b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la hUM/ dpral bar oM/ lce la dzaM/ dpung pa g.yas la b+ha/ g.yon la la/ thugs kar dzaHlte ba la len/ ngang gdong g.yas la dra/ g.yon la ye/ bol gong g.yas 
299b7(rgyud 'grel): la swA/ g.yon la hA/ yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa'o// kha dog gnag cing 'od ser po 'phro ba'o// yi ge de rnams dang / thugs ka'i rdo rje/ lte ba'i nang gi hUM/ zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od 'phros te/ 
299b8(rgyud 'grel): sems can la reg pas thams cad dzam b+ha lar gyur nas yid kyis hUM la bsdu/ yang de rnams las 'od 'bros/ rin po che thams cad bsdus te/ rlung nang du rngubs pas/ klu chen brgyad dang / rnam thos bu dang / 
300a1(rgyud 'grel): ne'u le'i kha nang du song / phyir rngubs pas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs nas/ rin po che'i phung po chen po byung / yang zos/ yang skyugs pa lan mang du bsgom// de rjes su rang gi lag pa
300a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas par oM las Da ki'i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du baM yig las 'od zer 'phros pas skyes bu'i bum pa bzang po'i lag pa bsams pa'i/ bumaM nang du dzaM/ mkhrig ma la o.oM/ mdzub mo la b+ha/ gung mo 
300a3(rgyud 'grel): lal/ srin lag la dza/ mthe'u chung la len/ mthe bong la dra/ mkhrig ma'i mtshams su ye/ g.yon la swA/ g.yas laN+Da/ re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o// de nas zangs gzhong ba'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs/ 
300a4(rgyud 'grel): med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten mdun du bskyed la/ chu khyor ba gang / oM in+d+ra Ni mu la d+ham ri swAhA/ zhes pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlab/ chu byor ba gang khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khar song bas/ 
300a5(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dzam gyis ser por gyur/ snying ga'i hUM la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud rtsir gyur pa slar gyen du log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil du byung ba mdun gyi dza maM b+ha la'i zhal du phul bar bsam zhing / oM dz+r-IM swAt+ma/ 
300a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la na re dang chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di gnyis so// mjug tu na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra yA/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA/ zhes lan bdun brjid la/ 
300a7(rgyud 'grel): chu khyor ba bdun dbul/ 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin/ de nas rten chu nang nas bton te logs su bzhugs/ bskyed pa yin na badz+ra mus gshegs/ gtor ma ga tsang sar gtang // rgyun du 
300a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags zlos la// oM dzam b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAt+ma zhes pa dang / na mo rat+na tra ya la sogs sngags phreng 'dam kha yin gsung / zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub pas the tshom mi dgos gsung / rjes su bad/ 
300b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan thams cad kyi tshe dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang / 'khor dang chab srid 'phel ba dang / 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol
300b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsol ba gdab bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab bo// dzam b+ha la nag po'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa pa chen shAkya bI zhal nas gsungs pa/ gnubs lo tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// sa brgyad dbang 
300b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug lha yi lha// mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel// mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che// u tsu t+pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa'i bstod pas bstod par bya'o// / rgya gar skad du/ aR+tha 
300b4(rgyud 'grel): dzam b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye bi sheSha stod+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin tshu'i dbang po la khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter 
300b5(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba// lcags kyus lcags btab 'dod dgu sbyin par byed// nyi shu drug ldan gsang sngags yi ge yis// lha min lha dang mi 'am ci bdud rgyal// nyi shu lnga yi sman mchog gis gang ba'i// 
300b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs skyogs las sgrub dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rab 'bab bcud kyi ril bu sbyin mdzad gang // nor rgyun lha mos legs bsten khyed la 'dud// thabs chen shes rab zabs sbyangs rin chen gyi// snying po/ 
300b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla'i sbyor ba las byung ba// dga' chen ye shes bzhi'i sam pu ti// mchog brnyes rmugs 'dzin khyed zhabs rtag tu 'dud// dzam yig las skyes lha chen yi ge bzhi// legs drangs rdo rje'i thugs gsung skung 
300b8(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan brgyar ba ldan pa// nyams dgu'i gar gyis rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// Sh+To pa ni ro d+ha yis rna ba mnan// thu brgyad kha yis dgra bo'i mdang sa 'brog byed// lugs bzlog lug 
301a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bzhi gnyis yi ge yis// byis pa'i srog dang gzugs 'jig mdzad la 'dud// klu brgyad brgyan gyi nor bu'i gdon 'grol zhing // chu 'dzin sprin 'dra'i lus la char chen 'bebs/ 
301a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni nor bdag gzir bas sa gsum gyi// nor 'phrog zhal bzhis bgegs 'joms mdzad la bstod// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod kyi yi ge bcus// rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed 'jigs las skyob/ 
301a3(rgyud 'grel): rkun po bsrung dang bu ster tshe bsring dang // phyugs skyong sted shing dbang bskur shis mdzad 'dud// gang phyi sa gsum skye bo rmugs byed pa'i// nor 'dzin sa brgyad dbang phyug yud tsam zhig/ mthong 
301a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gus 'phel nyi shus bstod bgyid pas// slub rnams phrin las nyi shus rgyal gyur cig 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin tshu'i dbang po la phrin las nyi shu'i sgo nas khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen 
301a5(rgyud 'grel): po nor 'dzin dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta chen po bud d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis/ mang yul gyi grong du 'phags pa wa ti'i pho brang du bsgyur ba'o// 
301a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya dza ma b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pe/ bcom ldan dza ma b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan chu dbang mgon po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis

301a8(rgyud 'grel): khrag bkang bsnams// g.yon pa gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin// 'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i// re 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo'i cha lugs dbu skra gyen du brdzes// mi'u thung byis pa
301b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa// nor bdag gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba rab gtsigs hUM sgras ma rungs gdul// dran pa tsam gyis ci bsams 
301b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mdzad// yid bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa// dpal ldan chu dbang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// u tsut+pa la gus pas bstod pa yis// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa gang thob des// 
301b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi// dbul phongs sdug bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa// paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
301b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dzam+b+ha la sto dra/ bod skad du/ dza ma b+ha la'i bstod pa/ dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha min dri za mi'am ci rnams kyis// cod pan 'od kyis zhabs kyi khri ni gsal mdzad pa/ 
301b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu nges mdzad gnod sbyin dbang phyug la// sems can rnams la sman pa'i bsam pas bdag gis gsol// gang zhig brtse ba'i bdag nyid byang chub sbyin mdzad khyod// snying rje'i rtsa ba sems
301b6(rgyud 'grel): can don du rab tu grags// mgon khyed sems can rnams la brtse bar mi mdzad na// khyod kyis sangs rgyas dran par gang gis 'gyur te mtshar// shin tu mi bzad dbul ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// 'gro 
301b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams lhung ba khyod kyis mthong bar ma gyur tam// rin chen gter chen rnams ni mtshan ni bzung byas nas// khyod kyis chu bo yang ni rdzing gis bcing bar mdzad// shin tu dbul ba'i byin za mi bzad drag 
301b8(rgyud 'grel): po yis// 'gro ba gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du sreg par byed// brtse ba nyid kyis ser sna rnam par spongs mdzod la// rin chen bdud rtsi'i char gyi char rgyun drag tu phob// khyod ni dgod pas brgya 
302a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis ni rgyal srid dang // spyan zur gyis khyab 'jug gis ni dpal mo dang // mnyes pas dbang phyug gis ni gangs ri'i gnas kyang thob// mgon po sdug phongs 'gron bu tsam 
302a2(rgyud 'grel): yang mi skyed ram// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug rnams la dpag med bde ba rnams// rtag tu khyod ster sdug bsngal can la de lta min// khyod kyis sngon ma mthong ba snying rje'i yul gyur pa'i// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal

302a4(rgyud 'grel): mgon pa sgreng ba'i tshogs rnams nges par stong byed dam// gal te khyod kyis ning gtong rnams la khyod kyis sbyar// skyeb tshig ngan rnams la dza ltar khyod 'jigs sam// rab tu 'bad pasangs par smra ba 
302a5(rgyud 'grel): yis mchog/ gnod sbyin rgyal po bdag gis gsol pagasan du gsol// rab tu 'bad byas de 'dra nar dang ldan b+har nas// ji ltar dbul po'i spyan thos par ma sbyar cig/ dbul po'i ma ni rab tu 
302a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bas 'gro ba rnams// sreg par nges mthong yid kyis ngo mtshar nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig bdag gis spras pa'i tshig rtsub tshig rnams ni// chu'i dbang po brtse phyir 'di rnams bzod par mdzad// 
302a7(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig bstod pa 'di yis ni// rtag tu 'bad pas dzam la bstod// de ni dbul por mi 'gyur zhing // shin tu mig yo'i dpal thob shog/ mi'i dbang po nyi ma rnam par mnon pas dza ma b+ha la la bstod pa 
302a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // kalpA Na mi tra gzhon nu shes rab kyis bskul nas rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hab+hUd+hA ra dang yang lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa s+ya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// 
302b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ u nuSh+mA dzam b+ha la u pa de sha sto tra/ bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gis bstod pa// dpal rdo rje sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po nam mkha'i mdog can/ 
302b2(rgyud 'grel): nair gyi char 'bebs pa// ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog nag por bzhugs// khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de bdag dran nu// khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci yi phyir ma gzigs// lo drug 
302b3(rgyud 'grel): byis pa'i gzugs la gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa// 'dzum la khrol byams pa'i mche ba dkar po gtsigs// khrog nyer dpral bar bskor zhing ral po dmar sor langs// dbul ba sel mdzad spyan yangs skye / 
302b4(rgyud 'grel): can la 'dud// mi bskyod dbul bzhugs pas thugs kyi rigs 'dzin cing // byams pas kun la khros te gtsar pu sbrul gyis brgyan// oM a las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs shing 'gyong // reb sgo 
302b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud// phyag g.yas snying rjes don mdzad thod pa thag gas bkang // phyag g.yo na sbyin ma bzung ni'u las rin chen 'bebs// g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis rnam thos sras kyi klung 
302b6(rgyud 'grel): pa brdzis// nor bdag gan N+Dal gnon cing btung bskum bzhugs la 'dud// rnab ma phug rigs ngan na lugs lhag maze// lag nas kha ru 'o ma'i bdud cu rtsal mardo rje nas b+hAng ste// gu dgum mdos 
302b7(rgyud 'grel): 'drazhal du phul bus mnyes mdzad la// nyid kyis bdag gi bsam mkhyen reb myur du bskangs// yi ge bcu pas byin brlabs me tog dang bcas pas// oM las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen smras 
302b8(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyan// i las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos chu phul nas// bcom ldan mgon paci phyir rab mi bskongs pag/ 'gro drug kun la re bskong nar gyi char pa dag/ tsa 'ad dmang po 'bebs pa'i thaH 
303a1(rgyud 'grel): rjer grags lags na// bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod// thigs pa gcig kyang mi gsol skal ba med dam ci// nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na/ 
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni yi chad skyid lugs gdong pa dag mod kyang // khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal// gter chen skal ba med kyang log 'tsho med tsam byin// bdag gis snying nas smras kyang da dung ma gzigs// 
303a3(rgyud 'grel): na// sa gsum kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam// bdag la skal ba med kyang thugs rjes ces mi gzigs// sems can min nam dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bral bar mdzod// bdag gis/ 
303a4(rgyud 'grel): bos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis// srid 'dir dbul ba sol la bde chen gnas su drongs// 'jigs la 'jigs par mi byed khyod kyi byin brlabs te// 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar rtag tu

303a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzes 'phags ma'i sku la 'dud// brtse ldan sbyin pa grub pa'i tshul mnga' ba// pad+ma'i zhabs mnga' 'gag med seng+ge'i sgras// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel byed ma// dpal ldan lha mo khyod 'dri'i 
303b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung la 'dud// tshogs gnyis mthar phyin sa bcu rim bgrod nas// thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can re 'dod skong // spros pa'i mtha' bral bde ba chen po'i ngang // yang dag don rtogs lha mo'i thugs 
303b2(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// phyag g.yas mchod sbyin bi dza pha la yis// 'jigs pa brgyad skyob 'gro rnams dbang du sdud// dbul ba sel zhing log 'dren 'joms mdzad pa// g.yon pa thugs kar rin chen ske ma 'dzin// 
303b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod 'dod re skong dpag bsam shing lta bu// yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bdag gis khyod la rtag tu mchod byed cing // gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rab bstod na// gdong la mchi 
303b4(rgyud 'grel): mas rab tu gos gyur kyang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig ma 'dor na// sngon gyi thugs rje'i smon lam gang du thal// las kyi 'phro med sbyin shugs zad pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i skal ba med 
303b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang // tshe 'dir phongs pas log 'tsho spong tsam gyi// thugs rje'i thigs pa 'ga' tsam cis mi sbyin// dus 'di nas bzung tshe rabs thams cad du// 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la mchod byed cing //

303b7(rgyud 'grel): chen bang mdzod dang // 'dod 'jo'i ba dang ma smos 'khrungs rnams la// rtag tu chos dang ldan pa'i longs spyod shog/ paN+Di ta dza mA ris lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa rdzogs so// 
303b8(rgyud 'grel): da byi napa gan sa ma thang 'i thub pas kyi rgyad sa byab bcugs so/ @#/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha pa ra dzI ta sA d+ha ni tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud/ 
304a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bdag gi sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// nor rgyas par 'dod pa gang dag gis gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar maN+Dal
304a2(rgyud 'grel): legs par byas te/ der me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / bshos dang / sil snyan bkod pa'i dbus su bum pa mdzes pa'i 'o ma dang / sman dang / 'bru dang / rin po che dang / spos dang 
304a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / chus bkang ste/ sbrum wAg dang bcas pa snam bu gcang mas dkris te/ srang bu sngon po btags la phyag na rdo rje bsnyen par bya ste/ yid bzhin nor bu 'bum du bzlas la bdag nyid la dbang 
304a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya'o// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ de nas nor lha nyid bsgrub pa ni khang bu shin tu dben par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la ba'i rnam lngas byugs te/ de la pad+ma 'dab brgyad lte ba dang bcas pa bri/ 
304a5(rgyud 'grel): lte ba dkar po 'dab ma brgyad ser por bya'o// de la rin po che'i me tog dgram/ dbus su bum pa dgod steng du sku gzhag/ mdun du zan dkar po'i gtor ma dkar gsum dang mngar gsum/ tshed ma swa 
304a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang / dri dang rtsi sman gyis brgyan te gzhag go// mchod pa'i rdzas dag kyang bkod la/ dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dpal phyag na rdo rje bskyed rim/ ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms pa'i mdun du paM las rin 
304a7(rgyud 'grel): po che'i pad+ma'i lte ba la hri dkar dmar las skyes pa'i nor lha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyis rin chen bai DUr+ya'o// 
304a8(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i gdan la 'bab bzhugs kyi skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ gsus po che byis pa'i gzugs lta bu can/ bzhin mdzes pa/ spyan 'bor la che ba/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis kun du klubs pa'i dam tshig gi 
304b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa bsams la/ bdag dang g.yog po'i dpral bar oM mgrin par hriM/ snying gar pr-i/ lte bar hUM/ gsang bar phaT kyis bsrungs te/ ye shes dgu gzhug bya'o// tshur 
304b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po kun gyi rgyal// gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gnas 'dir mchod pa 'bul gyis myur du spyon// bdag la zas nor gsol zhing bzhugs su spyon/ 
304b3(rgyud 'grel): e h+ye ha yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sa pa ri wA ra A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hUM dza/ des ni mdun du byon par bltas te/ bdud gsal ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya'am yungs kar 'phang zhing oM aHbig+h+nAn+ta kr-iHhUM phaT 
304b4(rgyud 'grel): ces pas rnam par phye nas mchod yon phul te/ dam tshig la mngon par bcug la mchod pa phul nas bstod pa byas te/ oM gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal gcig phyagi gnyis byis 
304b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs 'dra can// phyagayon yid bzhin rin chen bai DUr+ya// thugs kar 'dzin mdzad mi zad nor gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas lcags kyu 'dzin zhing rgyal po dang // btsun mo la sogs dgug 
304b6(rgyud 'grel): drang dbang du mdzad// dung mdog 'od 'phro rin chen rgyan mdzes ldan// rin chen gdan la rgyal sras skyil krung bzhugs// 'jig rten zas nor kun gyi bdag po ste// gang gis khyod bsgrubs phongs pa'i 'jig
304b7(rgyud 'grel): sel mdzad// nor lha'i rgyal po bkra shis 'byung ba'i gnas// 'jam dpal rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i rjes la rgyal ba sras bcas mchod la/ de dag gis lha mo mngon par sprul te/ bum pa lha'i 
304b8(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis bkang bas mngon par bkrus par bsam mo// spyi bor dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyas gdab po// de nas snying po'i sngags 'di/ skad che bar ma yin/ chung bar ma yin/ myur bar ma yin bral 
305a1(rgyud 'grel): bar ma yin par smra ba bcad cing rnam par g.yeng ba la sogs pa spangs te bzlas so// oM tri pr-i a pa ra dzI ta dzA dza hUM phaT/ bzlas pa gtor ba'i dus su mchod pa phul la/ gtor ma yang sbyin 
305a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ gtor snod bruM las rin po cher bsam/ gtor ma oM gyis sbyangs AHyis spang hUM gis bdud rtsir bsgyur te phyug na rdo rje la rang sngags kyis dbul/ gnod sbyin nor lha la sngags oM hri dza yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta/ 
305a3(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA ra a mr-i ta ba liM/ kha kha khA hi khA ti i dam ba liM bak+Sha yaM ma ma~M ba su puSh+TiM ku ru sarba dza ga ba shad+d+ha ru me swAt+ma/ oM ak+Sha ro mu khaM sarba d+harmaN Ad+ya nud panan tad oM AHhUM phaT sAny+dza zhes pa dang / tshogs su bcad 
305a4(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang bsngos la/ bstod pa bya/ chos bshad de phrin las bcol/ oM b+hU ta tri a pa ra dzI ta rat+na ma na sarba tri sam pa ti swAhA/ zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bskul lo// de nas dge ba bsngos la a ba ra 
305a5(rgyud 'grel): dzIta badz+ra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo// thun gnyis pa la sogs pa la dam pa tshig tshig rdzogs su bskyed la/ ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa sngang bzhin du bya'o// tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du bsgrub bo/ 
305a6(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga'i zhag gi dang po nas tho rangs kyi bar du sngags rgyun ma chad par bzlas/ lce pog dkar po'i bdug pa dbul tho rangs grub pa'i rtags snang ba ni rab gzugs mngon sum du ston te bdag gis ji ltar bya zhes 
305a7(rgyud 'grel): zer te/ bsgrub pa pos bdag gi bka' nyon cig bya'o// mna' bsgag dam chu blud ci 'dod bcol/ rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya bstan de phan chad bka' nyan te de la zhon nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthong ngo // 
305a8(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gnas su bskyal nas lha'i dbang pos dbang bskur bar byed do// 'bring sbra dang dug chen 'ong // gzugs sgra gang byung yang skrag par mi bya'o// de lta bu'i mtshan ma ma byung na nam langs pa'i dus su 
305b1(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam brtag/ des ma grub na phyi ma'i zla ba la de bzhin du bsgrub/ des kyang ma grub na yang phyi ma'i zla ba la bsgrub bo// de nas dngos grub ni rab rig pa'i rgyal po'i dbang thob bo// 'dod pa'i don thams cad 'grub 
305b2(rgyud 'grel): bo// lha dang mi dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur/ nor mang ba zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyi mi lang 
305b3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'byor ro// gal te gnod par byed pa byung na yang khros pa tsam gyis de ma zag tu 'chi bar byed do// 'bring ni lta bsgom gyi nyams myong skye// bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyus phyug par 
305b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ bkra shis par byed pa dang / dgra 'chi bar yang byed do// tha ma yang nor 'phel bar byed cing dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro// grub nas rtag tu bsten pa ni zla ba nya gang ba thams cad la gtor me gtang 
305b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// dngos grub gang byung ba de cha drug tu dgos te/ bla ma dang / dkon mchog gsum spyi dang / sems can dag la cha re re sbyin/ phyed kyi sgrub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o// sgrub pa'i dus su zas
305b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o// rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o// 'di grub na yon tan dpag tu med do// 'di la gdengs bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub ste/ mgo gnon ye shes bsnyen 
305b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdengs/ yang dag lta ba'i gdengs/ mi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdengs/ the tsom med pa nges pa'i gdengs so// de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o// dam tshig ni bla ma mnyes 
305b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing gsangs la bsgrub ste/ gzhan la thabs 'di bstan par mi bya'o// gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi bla ma dzA mA ris bsgyur ba'o// / 
306a1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje pa da ma kyi 'khor ban papa sa pa rnas par bye ba'i blab thabs bzugs// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra ku la tan+ta karma maN+Da la sap+ta kra mA tI sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las 
306a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa rnam par phye ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM khro la khros pa'i rgyal

306a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// legs par bsdus te bstan par bya// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras

306a6(rgyud 'grel): nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// kun gyi phyag rgya rdzogs chen mchog/ snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la sbyin//

307a2(rgyud 'grel): a ha ra pU dza hUM swA hA/ de bzhin du badz+ra d+hU pa/ puSh+pe A lo ka/ gan+d+he/ nai bid+yA pU dza hUM swAt+ma/ oM AHd+hI swAhA/ zhes byin gyis brlab/ de nas rak+ta spring zhing bdud rtsi yis tshogs mchod derag+ha ShA hi/

308b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin chu bdag gshin rje sogs// dregs pa khyo shug stan la bzhugs// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams// so so'i skul 'khril de 'khod// dkar mo tshogs dang rkun mo dang // rmongs pa dang ni thal byed ma/

308b5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na many+dzu shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsang+ku hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma mar+tha shrI he ru ka mar+tha tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsahUhUM

309a1(rgyud 'grel): nga dza/ badz+ra u mu ka hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra pa sme pa la ya ba de ho/ badz+ra ma nu rak+kha si b+h+yo/ pra mo ni b+h+yo/ ro'u tri b+h+yo/ pe swA pi b+h+yo/ ko ma ri b+h+yo/ oM na tra yo b+h+yo/ badz+ra bing ga laM b+h+yo/ 
309a2(rgyud 'grel): a mri taM b+h+yo/ sa me b+h+yo/ da na taM b+h+yo/ bag rak+ta si b+h+yo/ ba k+saM si b+h+yo/ ra ti badz+ra haM b+h+yo/ e ka tsa raM b+h+yo/ si ti ka b+h+yo/ ba ya b+ha b+h+yo/ ma hA mar naM b+h+yo/ ag+ne ye b+h+yo/ pa ra hi b+h+yo/ tsa mun+ti b+h+yo/ pu ta na b+h+yo/ ba ra 
309a3(rgyud 'grel): nab+h+yo/ badz+ra ma thA ka ta la b+h+ya/ badz+ra tsag sras ba dun d+ha/ bal po ta b+h+yAM/ de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor ba skyed// dam tshig dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs// da ni ye shes 'khor la ni// rad gi snying 
309a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'od 'phros// dbyings dang ldan pa'i lha mo yis// phyogs bsdus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // dmigs
309a5(rgyud 'grel): med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa'i sku// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i ngang gis chos su dag pa las// ye shes sgyu mas rol cing gshegs su gsol/ 
309a6(rgyud 'grel): ru rlung lu hUM ye h+ye hi badz+ra dza dza/ badz+ra kr-i ta sa ma yaM hUM zhes brjod nas phyag byas te/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes 'gro na zur mi mnga' yang // thugs rje chen pos 
309a7(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ 'jigs med he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srid byams pa'i tshul gyis
309a8(rgyud 'grel): grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug ma// ci bgyis bka' nyan ying sprul bsam mi khyab// bdud 'dral ye shes pho nya drug ca'i 
309b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// 'khor bcas rab 'bang kun la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pra ho pra ti pu ho sarba ta thA ga ta b+han d+ha naM ka ro mi/ i daM d+hU pa puSh+pa b+ha liM pra tits+tsha ho/ shrI ba na yo ki ni ho/ ta gi na ho zhes gus byas/ 
309b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM khro la khros pas zhi mdzan pa// thugs rje khros pas rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phaT/ badz+ra
309b3(rgyud 'grel): kr-i ta sa ma ya ho// der bstim lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan// so so rigs kyi 'bras bur 'gyur// snying gar mi spyod rdo rjes mtshan// de las ma mo brgyad spros 
309b4(rgyud 'grel): te// phyi rol mchod pa byin gyis brlab// dbyangs dang ldan pas dbul byas te// dang la thun mos rdzas lngas mchod// de nas khyad par rdzas kyis mchod// bdud rtsi sman gyis mchod rjes la// 
309b5(rgyud 'grel): sde zhing brtags pa b+hA ba ni// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyang ba 'di// ye shes lnga'i 'od zer rnam par 'gro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan te// dam chos gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhes su 
309b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol// he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas chen 'dir// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ste rar bcas// 
309b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyi an rgya mtshor 'khyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus zazhes nas bsnams su gsol// hUM mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po 'di// bdag dang mnyam pa'i chog 
309b8(rgyud 'grel): la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan mchod pa 'di// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// Sha hi ma hA maM sa kha hi/ 
310a1(rgyud 'grel): mahA rag ta kha hi// de nas 'khril te snyoms zhugs pas// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pas rol// mi dmigs thugs kyis mchod pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis 
310a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // de nas phyi rol 'thon po las// ma mo rnams kyis bstod pa ni// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin mche ba 
310a3(rgyud 'grel): zang yang za byed che ho// hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong di ri ri// thugs chen ri rab 'bum snyil skad// ha hA ha la gad rgyangs che// spyugs pa 'khor lo g.yeng ba che ho// hU~M khro bo shes rab 'od po che// 
310a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dkyil 'khor kun la gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun la 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hUM khro bo rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'babs// dkyil 
310a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// zla bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed// 
310a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba che// rdo rje chu bo sud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun char che// rdo rje rlung 'thor g.yeng ba che ho// hUM sgeg pod pa'o 'jigs su rung ba dang // nod dang 
310a7(rgyud 'grel): gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba la sogs pa// sku'i dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin// gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i dbang phyug gnon// hri mos byed stong pas lhag par 'dod pas 
310a8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// gdul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par 'jigs tshul ston// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag pa ston// thams cad dkyil 'khor gsum du snang par mdzod// dri rnam 
310b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis non pas gnon// ho ho ha ha he he hi hi// dgyes pa'i gad mo khong // dbang phyug thams cad rab bshig rab tu bshig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// rtog 
310b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mang po rgyud kyi gdul bya ma lus pa// ye shes sgyu ma ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par bstod// de rjes sngon gyi gnas su bzhugs thim nas// rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal ni// sngon du gsungs pa'i khro bo26 
310b3(rgyud 'grel): yang na spyan ras gzigs sprul pa'i// khro bo 'bar ba dbu dgu pa// phyag ni bco brgyad lta bu yi// snying gar drag po'i 'khor lo bsam// ru lu rtsa ba'i sngags dag ni// 'bum ma ma bye ba'i bar du bzlas// 
310b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor ro// thun mtshams mnyam par bzhag pa dang // rang gi nor du rin po che// yod par ma shes stor bar dran// tshol bar 'dod na 'di ltar bsam// byang chub sems 
310b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor ni// chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnas su// thugs rjes sa la mngon sbrul gshegs// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ byams mgon dam pa zhig gis bstan// 
310b6(rgyud 'grel): e ma byed kyis ma shes sam// mthun yun kun tu bde ba yin// sgron mas mun kun gser tshol ltar// gsang ba'i snying po mdzod brtol te// thig le gcig gis kun la khyab// thams cad lung
310b7(rgyud 'grel): chen nges par bstan// 'jig rten g.yo rdul mi'i rang bzhin rnams// 'bar ba lnga bcu'i khro bo ngang du snang // mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rnams// btsal med ma bcos de nyid rnam dag nas// 
310b8(rgyud 'grel): thig le yungs kar tsam zhig gsal bar bsgom// de las 'od zer rdul snyed spros// mun bsal dngos po kun sbyangs te// thams cad ma bcos sku ru gsal// slar 'dus thig le la thim nas// 
311a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od du zhu nas rim gyis bsdus// rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi nang // a gzugs pad+ma 'dab bzhir gnas// de steng gsang ba nang gnas sa rlung dang // snying ga nang gnas chu 
311a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gnyis// rnam par dge las zla ba ste// rdo rje rin chen gnyis rang bzhin// de steng rdo rje sems dpa' ni// thig le 'od zer lnga ldan pas// de steng mgrin pa gnas me rlung dag/ mgo bo'i nang 
311a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas rlung dkyil gnyis// dag pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng // pad+ma'i rigs dang las rigs so// kha sbyar dbus su thig le bsam// yang dang yang du 'dris bsams pas// mar 'gro mar 'gro gnyis
311a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gog go/ 'gog pa bzhin du mtshan ma ste// lam skye 'gag med pa'i tshes nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// maM mi zad pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// paM gnyis skyon med pa chos nyid rnam par 
311a5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i sgo'o// ta thogs pa med pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// muM brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hUM mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid yongs su snang ba'i sgo'o// oM tsir yang 
311a6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// sa ni chu la thim pas ni// kun tu mnyam blos zag med pa'i// las kyi ye shes dang por skye// chu ni me la thim pas na// sems la dbang thob du ba 'dra// 
311a7(rgyud 'grel): me ni rlung la thim pas na// ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig ldan pa ste// rlung gi rnam pa lta bur mthong // rlung ni rnam par rig pa la// thim pas 'dod pa rnam bral te// mar me lta bur mthong ba'o// rnam par rig 
311a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od gsal la// thim pa thams cad snang ba ni// phyi nang mun pa thams cad sbyangs// nam mkha' lta bur mthong ba'o// e ma'o dngos po med pa las// smon dang snying rje'i dbang gis ni/ 
311b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar snang ba ma bkag pa'o// 'dun pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu// yid la byed pa zhes thob ste// sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' bcu grol// brten pa sa gzhi yis par gnas// rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal
311b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la// 'phro 'du cig pa'i ting 'dzin thob// sems gzhi rdzogs te mtha' bcu shes// bdag nyid yi ge'i phreng bar ni// snang ba'i ltas mthong bsod nams gter// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 
311b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la// sems cig rdzogs te mtha' chub nas// 'jig pa lnga yangs khyad par sa// yongs su mi ldog ting 'dzin sa// 'jig rten nor bu rin chen gyis// gang bar spyod pa'i ltas mthong 'gyur// 
311b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyum sbyor ba'i skyes bu ste// 'khor lo sbur ba'i cha byang du// rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis// dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston// lung chen thob pa'i skabs su ni// sang+ge dag la zhon nas ni// 
311b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gnon pa'i ltas mthong 'gyur// sems bdun rdzogs pa'i sa par gnas// 'bras bu nyid la la mi shes pas// lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te// gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 
311b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs mchog sbyor// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skabs su ni// kun snang ting 'dzin nyid thob ste// des ni nyi zla'i chang bskor bas// thabs dang gsal bar byed ltas mthong // sems
311b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum bskyed cing mtha' drug chub// gdeng du gyur pa'i ngo bo las// de nas rgyal mtshan skyes bu de// chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi// gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan theg chen ston// mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul 
311b8(rgyud 'grel): snang // bshes gnyen dam pas bka' stsal pa// sa bcu pa la gnas pa yang // chos nyid du 'jog spyod par byed// ma rtog dang du mi gnas te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi byed do// e ma skyes 
312a1(rgyud 'grel): shAbu dam bkod// gang gi rab ci phying lags// skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal ba// gas sngags dngos po brgyad kyis bcings// mnyam par ma gzhag par du ni// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 
312a2(rgyud 'grel): myong ma yin// skyes bu dam pa khyod ci gu// gang zhig mos pa su zhig gis// ji ltar grol 'gyur ngo bo ci// skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal pa// grol bar 'dod pas bla ma bsten// rig pa rang 'byung rang 
312a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing khams rin chen yod pa na// rgyal ba kun du bzang po yis// sras mchog 'jam dpal chen po la/ 
312a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rims kyis brgyud pa bzhin// de bzhin 'byor pa'i yo byad la// rnam gsum tshul du nan tan bya// bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bka' bstod po nya'i dkyil 'khor ni// sangs rgyas 
312a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa yi ni// zhing khams mngon par dga' ba na// rgyal tshab skyes bu kun gyis gsungs// de'i gdam ngag mdor bkod pa'o// rtags dang rten ni gzhung ltar bsham// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs/ 
312a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// mtshon ni rkong rkang thang dmar na// ri ni byin lag mchongs kyi rtse// steng na 'dab chags rgyal po gnas// keng rus thod pa mkhar du brtsigs// ru las tshogs bdag bskyed nas ni// nye nas kro ti 
312a7(rgyud 'grel): shu rim// rang gi 'khor tshogs ldan pa bskyed// de nas dpa' bo chen po'i ru lu hUM gi 'od zer spros// drag pos gnas nas gdug pa dgug/ zhal du rngubs te sna nas bton// gzhon nu sme brtsegs zhes gyur te/ 
312a8(rgyud 'grel): bskyed dang gnyis su med par byas// de la ming dang mtshan btags pa// gang gi rgyal po zhes kyang bya// lha chen legs ldan nag po ste// lha'i sde dpon ka ru na// tshogs bdag chen po bdud kyi rje// dge slong/ 
312b1(rgyud 'grel): thar pa nag po yin// tshogs bdag chen po de gsol la// dpa' bo chen po gshegs su gsol// bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs// sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na// rgyal ba'i sras su bzung
312b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// hUM hUM hUM byi sha badz+ra kro ta// badz+ra la maN+Da la phaT/ ta ko ta ko phaT/ ha la ha la raM/ tig sA tig s+tha khaM/ kra ta kro ta yaM/ oM hUM muM/ skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen 
312b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed// bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs// grub pa'i rlung sgo gsang sgo 'dir// su dag 'ongs paslar mi ldog/ tshogs bdag chen pos yang gsol pa// bdag cag mtha' yas sems can rnams// 
312b4(rgyud 'grel): don gyis sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa la// mun pas bsgribs pas de mi shis// byang chub sems kyi lam 
312b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di nas// sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par bgyi// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor khyer// rdo rje can du cig nges na// gsang ba gsum du mnyam pa nyid// mi byed rdo rje dam tshig sbyin// 
312b6(rgyud 'grel): mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni// gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas byung // dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dam tshig ni// grub na 'jigs pa'i dus med do// nag po chen pos yang gsol ba// ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan 
312b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ gzi brjid phung po bla na med// sangs rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa// rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog nyid// rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa'i// khyod ni dam tshig 
312b8(rgyud 'grel): gtso lags kyis// dbang phyug rgyal pos bdag dbang bskur// dpa' bo chen po des gnang bas// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta a hi ha sarba maN+Dal hUM/ e be she ka hri ta/ nag po chen pos yang gsol pa// bdag ni
313a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu khyod kyis dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis de nyid bdag dbang bskur// bcom ldan thams cad mchog nyid bdag lags te// mchog nyid bsgrub phyir dbang rnams 
313a2(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bgyi// de'i rjes su 'khor rnams kyis// mos dang snyan pa'i tshil gsol te// se ng+ger sprul te gdan du phul// la las lus kyis brgyan du phul// la las sham thabs dag tu phul// la las 
313a3(rgyud 'grel): thig ler phul byas shing // la las byug par mnyes byas nas// la las phreng bar mdzes pa'i rgyan// la las phyag mtshan phul te gnas// de nas ging gi rgyal po la// mnga' gsol mchod pa'i tshul du 
313a4(rgyud 'grel): bstab// nye bar spyod pa lnga yang bzhin// dam tshig dam rdzas bsngo ba ni// dka' thub chen po tshur gson cig/ legs ldan nag po ma rungs pa// rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te// khra ma la btab 
313a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// rol cig dgongs shig dam tshig gtso// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// bse byang khram la btab pa yi// ma dang srin mo bud med la// dpa' bo khyod kyi rol mdzod cig/ 
313a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig chen pos ma gtad cig/ zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams// sems can kun gyi srog 'phrog pa// bse byang khram la btab pa yi// sha dang khrag la longs spyod kyis// gnod sbyin chen po ma rungs 
313a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bse byang khram la btab pa yis// gser sogs yul 'khor blangs nas ni// rang gi 'dod pas longs spyod kyis// rtog pa'i rgyal po rnams gson cig/ bsre byang khram la btab pa yis// 
313a8(rgyud 'grel): mgo thod bcad nas rtags rten dang // dge mtshan rnal 'byor ngas 'dod na// yid bzhin lta bu'i dngos grub gsol// rigs ngan sme sha can gyi tshogs// ba lang gi sha rta sha dang // mi sha glang chen sha 
313b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pazhes// srin mo khrag 'phrog ma lus la// bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag/ bzhes shig dgra bo'i khrag la rol// sprul pa'i 'phra men chen mo rnams// / thod rus rkang dang 'bru mar khrag/ chang dang 
313b2(rgyud 'grel): a mr-i tar sbyar ba yang // rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i dam rdzas bzhes// rigs ngan chen po ma rungs pa// sha chen bshang gce khu ba khrag/ dam rdzas 'bar ba 'di bzhes la// bdag gi nad rnams bzlog 
313b3(rgyud 'grel): tu gsol// dmigs bya 'di la rims nad thong // srid pa'i bud med ma rungs khyed// bro gar glu tshig mchod pa bzhes// dmigs bya 'jo tshul stobs kyis 'phrogs// shor ba gzhon nu bdud mo'i tshig/ 
313b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po'i bka' 'byung gis// sngags sgra rang gi mchod pa bzhes// dmigs bya'i phung po rdul du rlogs// log 'dren can gyi gdon rnams nyon// yang dag nad du kun rig na// che chung 
313b5(rgyud 'grel): las ni gang byas kyang // gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur gyis// rnal 'byor nga'i las 'di sbubs// gsang tshig sten pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// bshang gci khrag dang sol khu'i gos// brgya 'am stong du gon 
313b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// ling ga bcad na sangs rgyas 'jig/ dam rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par gyis// mnga' bdag chen po ma rungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste// khro bo 
313b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po ging chen po// mnga' bdag bdud kyi rgyal po bzhengs// rnal 'byor chen po ngas bstod cing // khyod kyis mthun pa'i rdzas phul bas// sngon gyi bskal pa bzang po la// khas blangs dam bcas mna' 
313b8(rgyud 'grel): bor ba'i// sngon du rigs 'dzin god mas bsgrubs// da lta rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// bai re thod pa mkhar gyi rtser// ru mtshon nag po pu ru ru// mtshon cha nag po char du pab// bdud bya nag po 
314a1(rgyud 'grel): lding zhing 'dzums// dur khrod mang po rgyan rnams rdzogs/ mche gtsigs rngam pa'i zhal gdangs nas// khro bo khro mo'i sprul par khrims// srin po srin mo rkan sgra rdebs/ 
314a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin po mo 'brug ltar sgrog/ za byed po mo glog ltar 'gyur// so so mos pa tha dad pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ni// yongs su rdzogs pas blang bar byos// de ltar mchod bstod byas 
314a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la// rang rgyud dam tshig gis gnas te// de dag rnams la mthun rdzas bsngo// de nas ging chen 'khor bcas kyis// 'bangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig 
314a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slan chad bka' bzhin du// bka' lung bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs// gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na// dam pa'i lung las 'gal 'gyur bas// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / 
314a5(rgyud 'grel): rul myags skams nas tshig par 'gyur// ma srid bu mo chung ma rnams// 'bangs su dbul lo tshig ma chung // dbus su mchis skal mi ldan gyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog/ pud la
314a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal kal mi ldan gyis// lhag ma zhal chab bron la gsol// nye gnas gdung mo ma sring rnams// deng nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis// khyed kyi ci bgyi las mkhan te// bka'i las byung rtag par 
314a7(rgyud 'grel): myur du sbubs// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes pas// rang gi srog la tshad du bzhag/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// brtse bar byed na mar bya'o// gdung bar byed na sring mo ste// brtson par byed na bran 
314a8(rgyud 'grel): du bya// byang chub dag ni bur bya'o// bdud bral med na slob mar bya'o// bskul ba mgyogs na pho nya bya'o// bka' bzhin byed na bka' la gdags// rdo rje ljags kyi 'od zer las/ 
314b1(rgyud 'grel): rag ka shri ri he ru ka/ ru tra ma tra ha haM zhes bsdus te bzlas pa bya// bsnyen pa bzlas pa 'bum byas la// don chen brtsal ba zhes su bshad// thun mtshams kun du mchod pa yang // dud chen la sogs 
314b2(rgyud 'grel): btang bar bya// don chen rnyed par gyur nas ni// sna'i bu ga'i hUM rings las// khro bo ging gi rgyal po ste// las kyi rgyal po srog bdag ni// ljang sngon drag po gsal zhing can// spros dang gnyis su 
314b3(rgyud 'grel): med par bstim// rgyu zhags khar nag skud pa 'am// mthing nag dang chen 'bar ba la// phye ma'i ri lu gsum smras te// rang gi lag pa g.yon par gzung // gzung thag blangs te sngags bzlas pa/ 
314b4(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i bsnyen pa 'bum du bzlas// don chen bsnyen par gyur pa yi// de nas don la 'jug par bya// rang gi lag pa g.yon pa yi// thum po bar ba kha phye nas// mkhar gyi nang du pho nyas bskul// 'bum
314b5(rgyud 'grel): du sgrub pa dag ni bzlas// de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa ni// gsum du byas te dbul byas nas// gdeng du gyur pa'i gsang sngags mchod// bsgrub pa chen po 'bum du bzlas// po nya ma nga' gzhug 
314b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dkyil 'khor// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sdug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na// rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal ba rnams// rkod rkang thang mar rgya mtsho'i de// 'brub khung brag shul can gyi 
314b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas// rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul// dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcas// bdag ni bka'i las mkhan te// bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba// de dag 
314b8(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bdag gis gdul// bka' las de dag mdor bkod pa'o// lho phyogs las kyi maN+Dal sum rtseg la// dang po thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// de 'og mtshon cha'i char gyis spras// da 'og me ri 'bar bas 
315a1(rgyud 'grel): spras// nang du rgyal sol nag pos byugs// de'i nang du ling ka ni// ji lta ba'i tshul gyis bzhag/ yan lag phyag rgya bzhi yis brgyad// kha ran dang por 'phra men ma// bar ma/ 
315a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni mgo mnyan te// tha ma la ni srin mo tshogs// gdug pa'i tsher ma'i phur bu la// mtshon par byas te rnam par bkod// mgul nas gdags shing rten la 'dud// de ni las la sbyar ba yi// 
315a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma la sogs mchod pa rnams// mnyes shing mgu ba gzhung bzhin bya// ji srid mtshan ma rnyed kyi bar// las la sbyor ba drug pa'i sngags// rngam pa'i nga ros gdon par bya// mnyes la sogs/ 
315a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gzu dbang gsol// de nas pho nya ma ngag par bya// 'bar ba drag po mi bzad pa'i// rtog pa med pa'i rgyal po las// rdo rje lcags kyi 'od zer gyis// badz+ra kro ta la sa ma ya// khro bo rgyal po sprin phung po// 
315a5(rgyud 'grel): mnga' gzhug pho nyar spro bar bya// rag sha dzA la sa ma ya// sngon po ma ngag pa'i drag sngags so// gnod sbyin rbad pa'i drag sngags so// tsit+ta dzA la sa ma ya// zad byed bskul ba'i pho nya'o// sngags dang ming 
315a6(rgyud 'grel): du spel nas ni// khros pas khri 'am 'bum du bzlas// dud chen btang la bskul ba ni// sngon tshe dpal chen nyid kyi bka'// de nas rnal 'byor rigs rgyud bka'// da lta rnal 'byor bdag sgrub kyis/ 
315a7(rgyud 'grel): khas blangs dam bcas brjed dam ci// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las mdzod// ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin// dam tshig can la dud dung gdung bar gyis// gang du srid byams ming la gdung ba 
315a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// dam tshig can la ljang ljang brtse bar gyis// mdza' bo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin// rnal 'byor can la kril kril brtse bar gyis// ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin// dam pa 
315b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la mnyes par nye bar gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung // chos rje 'od dpag med la rdo rje chos// spyan ras gzigs sprul dri las rngam tshul ston// ngag gi dbang phyug rta gdong zhabs kyis 
315b2(rgyud 'grel): gnon// 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la// sngonag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa// rdo rje gshogs pas bar snang khebs// ba spu lcags kyu bsregs 'dra yi// sdom dang 
315b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig dang sdig pa sprul// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi sa gzhi khebs// thogs skyobs stir rgyu zhags dang // nyi zla khyung dang 'ug pa wa// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang // za ma rtog dang rdul yab rnga// ri rab 
315b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi bskor stong gsum 'phen// klu dbang 'bum gyis brgyan gyis klubs// dus mtha' bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba ni// nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs// zhabs kyis 'bar 
315b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lha brgyad gnon// rdo rje srin po khro bor gyur// lha dang bdud las rnam par grags// me mchog thugs kyi sprul pa las// lha chen nag po mi bzad pa// mtsho ni rkang rkang zang dmar na// ri bo byan lag 
315b6(rgyud 'grel): mchongs kyi rtse// ma la ya'i rtse la lhags// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin// gzhon nu bye ba sa yang mdzad// baM ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsar// mgon po thugs kyi sprul pa ni/ 
315b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de// drag tu mngag cing bskul ba'i tshe// 'jig rten khams kun 'phung bar byed// thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ 
315b8(rgyud 'grel): ba ri thod pa'i rtsel lhags// mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha byang du// bai ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsar// khrag dang bshang gci sha chen dang // rkang dang klad pa klad rgyas dang // rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i/ 
316a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru dang shin tu 'bru chen po// sbrang ma spang rgod bung ba dang // sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs// ci sbyang stag seng la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis bskor// lha'i sde/ 
316a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon ka ru na'i// bu mo chung ma ma sr-ing dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi// ma srid bu mo chung ma rnams// phyogs nas dbang du byas pa rnams// zlas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis 
316a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni brgyad la sogs// ma mo 'phra men gnod sbyin ma// srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma// bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla kun ma// dam nyams 'di'i bla la yang // blon po sde dpon sde dpon mo// ru mtshon 
316a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po phyar nas ni// ru dpon pho nya mngag par bcas// rang rang stan dang lag char chas// ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' stod 'khor// srad dang rngam pas dgra snying khos// srid pa'i bu mo dri za 
316a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad// stag seng ce stang bzhad sogs dang // dur bya rog po 'ug pa'i tshogs// bstod cing rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// nyams pa 'di'i snying dkyil du// cho 'phrul sna tshogs khyed la bsregs// srin mo'inye 
316a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas chen mo brgyad// ke re tse pra mo ha/ be ta li dang pu ka si// g+hasma ri dang sma sha ni// maN+Dal li la sogs pa yis// srog la hur thums dus la bab// dur khrod sa'i sgo spungs bzhi// brtson mo 
316a7(rgyud 'grel): gdong mo gar log ma// de bzhin 'jug mo chen mo bzhi// gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung // rnal 'byor 'khor dang bcas pa la// bar chad bsrung ba'i dus la bab// dam nyams 'di'i yan lag chings// 
316a8(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod bdag mo grub 'debs ma// nam ma shin tu rkam ma dang // ra ro ma dang khrag mthung ma// chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// dam nyams 'di'i dbugs long la// spro 'bogs gtang 
316b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus la bab// nyams su myong bar khros dus ni// sngon du snyen phul mnga' gsol ba'i// mtshon cha nag po thogs nas ni// skabs der thun gzer brdeg par bya// bde gshegs rgyal 
316b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus kyis// mar ku lta bu'i snying po gsungs// de 'dra'i bstan pa dam pa la// sgo skur rnal 'byor yongs la 'tshe// da lta rnal 'byor nga yi dgra// pho nya ma ngag gzhug ma lus kun// 'di la 
316b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ma gnas kyis// drag po las kyi thun la bab// rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs// mthong nag khro gnyer ral pa can// 'bar ba chen po gar dgu mdzad// dur khrod bdag po ji bzhin du/ 
316b4(rgyud 'grel): dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// rdo rje zla rtsal nyi ma'i mdangs can dang // rdo rje sing+ge nam mkha'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje spyang gi rdo rje dus mtshams dang // rdo rje phyos 
316b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul rdo rje dur khrod bdag/ rdo rje ro langs rdo rje ma rungs pa// legs ldan nag po bdud kyi rje// gsung gi nga ro drag po mi bzad pa// 'ur 'ur chem tsham drag po'i sgra dang ldan// rab tu brtsigs 
316b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku ni mi bzad pa// mgul ldeka rab g.yos dgra la thun// dpa'o khyed kyi shes rab ma// baM ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis// brtan par btab bI 
316b7(rgyud 'grel): nang bdag mo// nye gnas kro ti shri re ma// thod phyogs khrag gis bkang ba dang // 'bru mar rdzas lnga char sbyar ba// rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'dzin// chags pas myos shing rkam pa nas// ches 
316b8(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' drag tu bskul ba'i tshe// sngags sgra drag po mi bzang pas// rang la rang yang brtsig cing bdum// srin po srin mo'i tshogs rnams kun// drag por sngags drag ngas bzlas shing // gdug pa'i 
317a1(rgyud 'grel): 6/ lus can mtshon char bcas// glad pa'i dkyil du rgyab pa yis// rkang pa'i mthil du sa ma ya// a bi ra tsa'i gnag pa yin// thun 'jug 'khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis// bdud rtsi lnga'i/ 
317a2(rgyud 'grel): mdangs sbyor bas// gshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur// byas la mi rtsegs phrin las dang // spyod la ma chags ye shes kyis// thams cad stong zhing rdo rje sbyangs// sgyu ma'i phung po lhag ma la// khro bo/

317a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// ling ga ming byang bris te bzhag/ a ra ma ru sha dang ni// kra sA srur bzhi chad yi// thod pa kha sbyar zhags pas gsum// ka ru na'i phyag rgya dang // gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer 
317b1(rgyud 'grel): chen gyis// blangs te dur khrod nag po'i tshal// mi mthun 'dus pa'i sar song la// gtor ma la sogs rngan pas mchod// gru gsum khru do rko byas la// gong gi mkhar chen bcug nas ni// g.yam 
317b2(rgyud 'grel): pa nag pos kha bcad nas// rdo rje d+ha bram gyis mnan bya// chu mig nag po ma rungs dang // lha khang mgon po'i zhabs 'og tu// mnan pa byas kyang 'thub par gsungs// gtad khram mnan pa'i dkyil 
317b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ro// de gting sgrub pa'i gnas phyin nas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// spyan drangs lha rnams ma lus la// mchod bstod bshags pa bya ba dang // gtang rag lhag ma'i

317b5(rgyud 'grel): lam la// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ci bder spyad// grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang // bdag pas blo dman ched du ni// dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i sgrub thabs phye// tshad ma dang ldan mkhas pa rnams//

317b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud bstan pa bsrung ba// rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bdun gyi rim pa rnam par phye ba slob dpon snang mdzad myu gus mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
317b8(rgyud 'grel): 'i'i 'amamag/ @#/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi rgyud long ba'i yul na dpal 'bras kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i pho brang yod de// de na chos kyi dbyings ngag gi 
318a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten gyis yongs su g.yogs pa'i rje btsun bzhugs so// der phyin nas rje btsun gyi mchod rten la phyag stong phrag lnga btsal bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags 
318a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog ces bya ba'i gzungs bzlas par bya'o// de la brjod par bya ste/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti Ar+ya badz+ra shri kha lA yai/ ha na ha na/ tshin+da tshin+da/ pi ba ba Sha/ ka pA laM hUM ta ra ta ra/ ta raM ga ba tri a DaM gany+tsa badz+ra 
318a3(rgyud 'grel): A ya te/ badz+ra pra kA re ai na mo b+ha ga wA te/ Ad+ya badz+ra thI kha le pUrba daM shaM ban+d+ha/ dak+Shi na di shaM ban+d+ha/ piny+tsa ma di shaM ban+d+ha/ uSh+ka ra di shaM ban+d+ha/ A d+ho di shaM ban+d+ha/ da sha d+hi sha ban+d+ha/ ma sA pA di sha ban+d+ha/ yak+Sha 
318a4(rgyud 'grel): rang saM bAn+d+ha/ b+huta prI ta pa shAts+tsha bat+ta/ sad+d+ha yo gai DA kaM na~M ban+d+ha/ e ka pA daM ban+da/ dr-i pa R+Sha ban+d+ha/ tri p+tA daM bat+ta/ tsaN+DapU dI ban+ta/ ban+d+ha pA ban+d+ha/ apA ban+d+ha/ sarba pra pA da bAn+ta/ praSh+Ta dang

318a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// des gnod sbyin bgegs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i rjes su ma la ya'i yul du 'gro bar bya'o// der phyin nas chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten rje btsun la bskor ba stong phrag

318b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas khyim gyi bsam pa dran par mi bya'o// byas na sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ro// dpal ldan po ta la ka'i rje btsun gyi zhal mthong ba don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams kyis//

319a1(rgyud 'grel): / las rgal te mthong bar 'gyung ba ni shing rta la dang shing sa la dang / pi ba la'i shing dang / skya bshul dang / aM bu dang / 'dzam+ba dang / sha kos Ta ka dang / ba ru ral sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang

319a7(rgyud 'grel): ban nyi ma bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshe'u mthong bar 'gyur ro// uta pa la la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ 'gram bzhi ni lho'i 'gram ni rigs pa 'dzin pa 
319a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi'o// nub kyi 'gram ni lha rnams kyi'o// byang gi 'gram ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi'o// shar gyi 'gram ni nags kyi lha mo rnams kyi ste/ tshe'u deng bgrod par mi bya zhing / chu ba tung / 
319b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mi bya'i// ji srid zhags phye dang gnyis su byin te mtsho de la bltas la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM hUM hUM hUM dza dza dza pra yats+tsha pra ya ts+tsha ya phaT phaT kaM kan le ma hA ba la se na mo Ta 
319b2(rgyud 'grel): ya mo Ta ya oM hUM hUM trAM swA hA/ mtsha de la g.yon nas bsod de 'gro bar bya'o// sprin drug gi bya nyon cig sems can gang la la bdag gi drung du 'ong bar brtson pa dad pa dang ldan pa bden par smra ba don du gnyer 
319b3(rgyud 'grel): bltos pa med pa rnams 'ong ba na de rnams kyis gal te grub par ma gyur cig nga dang lhan cig mthong bar ma gyung na de'i tshe bdag nyid mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa por 'gyur ro// dpal ldan po ta la kaH/ 
319b4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun gyi dam bcas pa brtan pa'o// nyi ma lnga'i bar du dka' ba chen pos 'gro bar bya'o// phyi nas yang rgya shug gi bsti gnas mthong bar 'gyur te/ de la sna tshogs pa'i shing la sogs pas brgyan nas

330a1(rgyud 'grel): par byin gyis brlobs// thugs kyis byin brlab ye shes phob// sems la 'od gsal bskyed du gsol// su gsung thugs kyis byin gyis rlobs// byin rlabs chu rgyun ma gcod

330a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// snying po phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs shog/ grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gsol 'debs/ bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / ma pa din dpa bya 'astong pa/ 
330a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyagang gad / gra dA bar ma praN+Da shrIn+d+ham hAste/ bde sa / tha ma dam pa bsad nams dpal zhes bya ba la bstod pa/ chos 'byung ra ba gzigs shin tu yangs pa'i sa// bas nas 
330a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi zhabs zung dag la bsten par bgyi// mkhas pa 'di na kun tu bskyod par gyur pa la// sngon chad ma mthong stong nyid rtse mos ngo mtshar mthong // shin tu rgya chen zab pa 'di ni chen po'i tshul// mchod 
330a6(rgyud 'grel): rten baspyod pa lta bu'i skul lhag par bzhin// dpal mchog bla ma ston pa'i bstan pa la// dus des gsal ba 'od gsal chen po'i tshul// mtshungs med snying rje'i bcud kyis sems can bde mdzad pa/ 
330a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni ngo mtshar bsod nams dpal gyi ye shes sku// de ni kun la byams pas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal// bde zhing bde ba'i snang ldan spros pa mi mnga' ba// bzod pa'i gter chen dga' ba'i ro mchog dang / 
330a8(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa kun tu rdzogs sangs byang chub lam rnams mkhyen// gti mug mun ljongs 'grol rab tu gsal bar mdzad// de ni ci ldan bsod nams dpal gyi ye shes su// po ta la khar spyan ras gzigs dbang 
330b1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs pad la// bung ba rol pa zhes bya'i stobs ldan spyan dag gis// lho phyogs yul du lam tsho la yang dag bskyod pa yis// rim bzhin 'chag la dub pa med pa'i bsod nams dpal// sangs rgyas
330b2(rgyud 'grel): mthu yis rgya mtsho zla bas gang ba bzhin// dpal mchog bla ma 'di ni lam mchog ded dpon mkhas// ye shes bdud rtsi'i brlabs kyis lam gyis dub pa la// nyer phyin lam la mkhas rnams kun gyis 
330b3(rgyud 'grel): brten par bya// dpal mchog bla ma 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa la// dus la rab gsal 'od gsal chen po'i tshul// mtshungs med bla ma'i zhabs la rab tu bdud// rgya gar lho phyogs kyi yul dpal 
330b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'bras kyi phung po zhes bya'i mchod rten bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / bla ma man langs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi spyod parlabs po che/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dang / cha mthun pa la mos pa'i pan+d+ha 
330b5(rgyud 'grel): ta bi ma la shrI zhes bya ba mkhas shing btsun pa des tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bsdod pa'o// dpal ldan man lungs kyi gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta go ta ma b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba grags pa byang chub gnyis kyis 
330b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// bla ma'i bstod pa chos 'byung rab gzigs zhes bya ba lags so// 'di thams cad kyis kha ton du gdon par bya'o// // rgya gar skad du/ maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ maN+Dal gyi chog/ 
330b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nu la// phyag 'tshal maN+Dal cho ga bshad// maN+Dal bsdu na rnam gnyis te// yid kyis bsam dang 
330b8(rgyud 'grel): dngos byed par// yid kyis dbul ba yid kyis yon// dngos byed yan lag dgra rdzogs dbul// rgyu rkyen sngon 'gro mtshams dang tshad// dbyibs dang bdog byin brlabs rgyan// saM bzang byed ma gci ba la// srog chags la sogs gsal 
331a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la// 'jim pa legs par bsgrub par bya// de nas tshad med stong nyid bsam// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags 'di yis// thog mar mtshams bcad bdag nyid bsrung // 
331a2(rgyud 'grel): oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ zheng du khru gang yan chad tshad// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lham pa la// nang du zlum por bskor bar bya// kha dog kun ka sngo yang rung // yang na yid dang ci 'thang bya/ 
331a3(rgyud 'grel): ya na dang kha dog dbyibs// phrin las rnam bzhi tshul dang sbyar// de nas snying gape sa bon las// 'od 'gros la ge tri zla bas ma/ stegs ni rin chen sna lngar bsam// oM pany+tsa rat+na maN+Da la hUM/ ba yi rnam lnga 
331a4(rgyud 'grel): dri lnga la// sa bon 'od 'phros a zhu bas// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyur par bsam// oM a mri te hUM phaT/ de nas legs par byug par bya// tsan+dan la sogs dri lnga la// 'od 'phros yi ge du zhu bas// 
331a5(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa'i mchog tu gyur par bsam// oM badz+ra d+hU pa AHhUM/ rnal 'byor 'byor pa chung na'ang rung // tsan+dan med du mi rung ngo // de ltar dri zhim legs par byug/ de nas me tog rgyan bkram pa/ 
331a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga sogs yang na lha grangs bsdun// de steng paM las pad+mar bsam// oM pad+ma maN+Dal hUM/ de'i steng a las zla dkyil bsam// oM tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hUM/ de steng bruM las gzhal yas khang shin tu mdzes pa bsam 
331a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ de nas mgon po spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig pa bshags// gzhan gyi dge la yi rang bya// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab// dge ba 
331a8(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad la// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub bsngo// de ltar phul ba'i yon tan ni// pha rol byin bcu rdzogs ldan zhing // sgrib pa gnyis byang tshogs rdzogs te// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal 
331b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur// de ltar ma byas nyes dmigs ni// rdzogs la brtan pa ma thob par// maN+Dal 'jog na mkha' 'gros gsod// de bas nan tan gus par bya// lung dang 
331b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag bla ma las brgyud pa// maN+Dal chog rim par bkod pa 'di// blo zhan don du bdag gis cung zad bsdus// 'bral na bzod mdzad mkhas rnams gzhan du rtsoms// dri med blos bsdus dge ba 'dis

331b8(rgyud 'grel): bdun du rim gyis byug/ de nas lag snum dag gis byug/ doni mi brtan par yang bshad// brtan par bya ba'i chog ni// maN+Dal zur ni rims kyis byugs// mdangs ni byung na legs par bshad// de nas

332a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// maN+Dal bya ba'i cho ga 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang gsang sngags gnyis ka'i thun mong ba'o//

333a1(rgyud 'grel): chos klog pa la sogs pa dang / bla ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga ni/ oM badz+ra b+hU mi AHhUM zhes brjod pas sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas gci ba chu dang bcas pas phyogs su 
333a2(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog gzhag ste/ oM badz+ra re ge AHhUM zhes bya bas ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas me tog dgram pa'i sngags ni/ oM haM ma hA me ra be na ma 
333a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus so// oM yaM purba bi de ha ya na maHshar phyogs su'o// o raM dza bu dwI pa ya na maHlho phyogs su'o// oM laM a pa ra go dA ni ye na maHnub phyogs su'o// oM baM ut+ta rA ku ra be na maHbyang 
333a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su'o// oM ya u pa dI pa ya na maH'di lan gnyis brjod de/ shar phyogs kyi mtshams g.yas g.yon gnyis su me tog gi tshem bu dgod do// de bzhin du oM raHu pa dwI pa ya na maH'dis lho

333b2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// mtshan yongs su grags par gyur pa dge bshes rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa lags so// zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong dang ma grag

335a4(rgyud 'grel): me bzhin 'phros pa yis// bdag dang sems can ma lus pa'i// sgrib pa thams cad bsregs par bsam// dus kun bya ba'i spyod lam ni// lus ngag yid gsum bya ba'o// lus kyi phyag rgya la sogs bya//

335a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po 'bab par bya// rkang mthil bar du lus khyab nas// ral dub bsal bar gyur par bsam// ji srid mo skyo'i bar du bsgom// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig ni/ 
335a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bzhin bag yod bsgom ste bsrung // nyin phyed chos skyong gong dang mthun// rgongs ka'i chos spyod gsum yin te// chos spyod dang ni mdog don dang // smon lam dag ni gdab par bya// chos spyod 
335a8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa gong ma bzhin// bcu gsum du ni shes par bya// mdo gdon shes rab snying po de// zab mo'i don la bskul phyir ro// dge ba mi zad bsngo ba'i phyir// smon lam dam pa gdab par bya// 
335b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams bshags snying ga'i dkyil 'khor ni// rang nyid yi dam lhar bsams nas// de snying pad+ma zla dkyil 'khor// rigs lnga'am yang na don grub ni// lha ni snying gar bskyed par bya// de la don grub bskyed pa ni// 
335b2(rgyud 'grel): khaM bsam de las ral gri bsam// ral gri kham las 'od 'phros pas// sems can don byas slar 'dus pas// bde gshegs las rigs nyid du gyur// sku mdog ljang khu g.yas sngo g.yon dkar/ 
335b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// dang po gnyis ni yum la bzhud// g.yas kyi gnyis pa ral gri 'dzin// gsum pa sna tshogs rdo rje ste// g.yon gyi gnyis pa 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon gyi gsum pa pad+ma bsnam/

335b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas 'gro skyabs phyir// yon tan 'byung gnas gsol ba ltar// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// de bzhin du ni bdag la gsol// de bzhin gsol ba btab pa yis// de bzhin gshegs 
335b6(rgyud 'grel): pa kun mnyes nas// spyan la sogs pa'i lha mi rnams// bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yi// dbang bskur bar ni bsam par bya// zhal nas tshig 'di 'den par bsam// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/

345a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ Ar+yA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ye/ sarba ta thA ga tA pa ri mi tA pa ri pU ri ta ye/ tad+yathA/ oM sid+d+hi sad+d+hi bad+d+ha bad+d+ha/ bod+d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tsa la tsa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ti ka pa ka pa/ b+hA ra bA 
345a3(rgyud 'grel): gasnag ts+tsha a gats+tsha a gats+tsha b+ha ga ba ti ma thi la~M baM swAH/ gzungs 'dis lag pa g.yas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/ de'i steng du mgo bzhag ste sang+ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal lo// mtshan mo tha ma 
345a4(rgyud 'grel): nas de bzhin du med ma yengs pa dang rgyun chad pa zad pa med ma mtha' dag b+ha'o// de ltad nyin ning byas na rigs kyi bu'am zhes bu ma mAr du byung chub tu 'gyur ro// de yang gsangs pa// sprin dang na la khrims 
345a5(rgyud 'grel): bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan la sogs rtag brten bya// dus ni yun mi ring ba yi// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes so// gzung bsdus pa yi bsod nams las kyis ni// bdag cag byang 
345a6(rgyud 'grel): chub gzung lam 'di brten nas// spobs sna tshogs spyod pa spyad nas ni// skye bos bla me go 'phang thob par shog/ byang chub gzhung lam zhes bgyi ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas 
345a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / na mthong ba bzhin bzlas paste/ 'ang gi tshad ni TIg sung sa nyi na \u0f7f// dang po'i las kyi b+ha ba ma brtan par // nges par byang chub mchog thob ma nas kyang /
